productAttributes.productDescription:
In gaming precision is everything, especially if you are competing in gaming tournaments. The game might be the same, but gameplay never is. Objectives which seemed easier once may seem impossible the next time. To overcome all this, you need gaming gear that delivers flawless performance every time. You need the Imperator gaming mouse from the house of Razer.

The Imperator has qualities of a laser as well as an optical mouse. Equipped with a 4G dual sensor, the mouse uses both sensors in sync to give you optimal tracking precision. Built exclusively for gaming the mouse is compatible with a variety of operating systems like Windows 7, Vista, XP and the Mac OS X.

Body

 The Imperator has a smooth and refined finish. The mouse provides you with excellent grip as contoured rubber thumb grips. This feature is especially helpful if you indulge in long gaming sessions. The Razer mouse has an ergonomic right-handed design. The mouse has 7 Hyperesponse buttons in total. These include the left-and right-click buttons along with illuminated scroll wheel. 2 buttons are etched behind the scroll wheel. 2 more buttons are available on the left side of the mouse, just where you place your thumb.

The Imperator has the dimensions of 71 X 42 X 123 mm. The gaming mouse from Razer is equipped with zero-acoustic mouse feet, giving the mouse smoother movement. You can easily connect the mouse to your computer through an USB port.

Performance

The highlight of the buttons used in the Imperator is that they are programmable and adjustable. The buttons available on the left side of the mouse can be adjusted to place the thumb properly, according you your convenience. You can independently program the buttons to change controls and play games the way you seem fit.

The Razer mouse has a 6400 dpi, giving you maximum speed and precision. The wide dpi assists in quicker movement of the mouse. You can tune the dpi level as many times you want as the mouse is capable of on-the-fly sensitivity adjustment. The mouse is equipped with 1000 Hz polling, giving it 1 ms response time.

The mouse can be used on almost any surface. The Razer Imperator is built with Razer Synapse on-board memory that allows you to create different game profiles. This is helpful as you can use different gaming profiles for different games without having to change controls each time.
productAttributes.title: Razer Imperator USB 2.0 Gaming Mouse Black

productAttributes.productDescription:
Experience the freedom of playing games without the clutter of wires with the Orochi notebook mouse from the house of Razer. The laser mouse is small in design, but packs in plenty of features. Built for gaming, the Orochi mouse offers precision and good responsive feedback. The mouse is compatible with a variety of operating systems such as Windows 7, Vista, XP and Mac OS X.

Body

 The Razer Orochi has a small and compact body. The mouse is ergonomically designed to easily fit into your hand. The Orochi has an ambidextrous design, making it usable by both right- as well as left-handed users. The mouse has 7 buttons in total. These include the left- and right-click buttons along with an illuminated scroll wheel. 2 buttons are placed on the left side of the mouse, just where you place the thumb. 2 more buttons are placed on the right side of the mouse.

The Orochi weighs 68 g and has the dimensions of 67 X 35 X 99 mm. The less weight of the mouse makes it extremely portable. The Orochi is a dual mode mouse that uses both wired and wireless technologies. You can connect the mouse wirelessly to your computer using Bluetooth. 2 AA batteries are needed to use the mouse in Bluetooth mode. You can use the wired mode to connect the mouse to your computer through a USB port. The mouse gives you smoother movement as it has zero-acoustic mouse feet.

Performance

 The buttons available on the Orochi are programmable. This allows you to use the same mouse for playing different games. As the mouse operates on dual modes, it has dual dpi settings. On wired mode, the mouse is capable of giving you 4000 dpi. On wireless mode, the mouse will provide you with 2000 dpi. The polling too changes according to the modes selected. On wired, the mouse has 1000 Hz polling and 1 ms response time. On wireless, the mouse has 125 Hz polling and 8 ms response time.

You need not worry about power fluctuations during the rainy seasons as the mouse has a gold-plated USB connector. You can adjust dpi settings as many times as you want with the Orochi, as it is capable of on-the-fly sensitivity adjustment. You can use the mouse on almost any surface, without any hassle. Equipped with a 3G laser sensor, the Orochi mouse has Razer Synapse on-board memory that allows you to create multiple game profiles.
productAttributes.title: Razer Orochi Wireless, USB 2.0 Gaming Mouse Black

productAttributes.productDescription:
Comfort is one of the many important factors that should be primarily present in a gaming device. When you are indulged in long hours of gaming sessions, you need as much comfort you can gain. The Ikari optical mouse from the house of SteelSeries is designed just for that - to give you comfort.

The Ikari optical mouse has many features to improve your gaming experience. Built for gaming, the mouse can also be used for 3D modelling, Animation and other purposes. The mouse is compatible with a variety of operating systems such as Windows 7, Vista, XP, Windows 2000 and Mac OS X.

Body

 The gaming mouse has a sleek and refined look. The Ikari mouse has an ergonomic design, making it easily fit into the palm of your hand. This allows you to use the mouse for hours, without causing any discomfort to your hands or fingers. The SteelSeries Ikari has 6 buttons in total. These include the usual left- and right-click buttons along with a scroll wheel. 1 button is available beneath the scroll wheel, allowing you to change the dpi settings. 2 buttons are placed on the left side of the mouse, just where you place the thumb.

The Ikari mouse weighs just 103 g and comes in the dimensions of 83 X 36 X 130 mm. The Steelseries mouse has 2 m anti-tangle braided cord. This is a helpful addition as you can easily move the mouse during intense gaming sessions, without getting it entangled. You can easily connect the mouse to your computer using a USB port. The SteelSeries mouse gives you smooth movement as it has large glide pads.

Performance

 The dpi rocker on the mouse allows you to easily change dpi settings on-the-fly. These settings can be easily seen as the mouse has a dpi indicator. With 1000 Hz polling, the mouse gives you a 1 ms response time. This is essential when you are playing FPS games, as you need quick feedback from the computer to take out your enemies. You can expect quicker and faster movement from the mouse as the SteelSeries Ikari is equipped with a wide 400-1600 cpi.

The rainy season in India has a direct effect on power fluctuations, but you need not worry about that with this gaming mouse. The SteelSeries Ikari comes with a gold-plated USB connector, making it usable even during the most severe power fluctuations. The mouse can be used on almost any surface, without any hassle. The Ikari features a driverless, plug-and-play system. This is a helpful feature as you can use the mouse on any computer, without having to install the software every time.
productAttributes.title: Steelseries Ikari USB 2.0 Optical Gaming Mouse Black

productAttributes.productDescription:
Gaming industry has grown a hundred fold since the days of Mario and Dave, and with it has grown the quality of gaming gear. The newest addition to the ever-improving gaming equipment is the Lachesis mouse from the house of Razer. The laser mouse has a ton of features that can help you in fine-tuning your skills. Targeted towards hard-core gamers, the Lachesis mouse is compatible with a variety of operating systems such as Windows 7, Vista and XP.

Body

 The Lachesis has a sleek and sophisticated build. The mouse has an ergonomic design, making it very helpful to indulge in extended gaming sessions. The Razer Lachesis has 9 Hyperesponse buttons in total. These include the normal left- and right-click buttons along with an illuminated scroll wheel. 2 buttons are placed behind the scroll wheel to change the dpi. 2 buttons are placed on the left side of the mouse, just where you place your thumb. 2 more buttons are etched on the right side.

Weighing just 128 g, the Lachesis comes in the dimensions of 71 X 40 X 129 mm. The mouse has a 7 foot long, lightweight cord. The long length of the cord eliminates any entanglement, making it easy to use. You can experience smooth movement with the mouse as it is equipped with zero-acoustic mouse feet. The unique feature in the Razer Lachesis is the adjustable multi-color LED. This feature allows you to choose any color from the 16 million shades on offer. You can easily connect the mouse to your computer through a USB port.

Performance

The scroll wheel of the Lachesis has 24 individual click positions. This makes it easy to manoeuvre in-game elements. The buttons available are independently programmable, making the mouse fully customizable. You can move the mouse as quick as you want as it is equipped with 5600 dpi Razer Precision engine. This is a helpful addition as you can adjust sensitivity on-the-fly.

Equipped with 3.5G laser sensor and 1000 Hz polling, the mouse has a 1 ms response time. The small response time makes the mouse very fast in carrying out your commands given to the computer. Power fluctuations wont be a bother with this Razer mouse as it comes with a gold-plated USB connector. You can use the mouse on almost any surface, without any difficulty. The Lachesis gaming mouse comes with 60 KB Razer Synapse on-board memory. The memory available lets you create multiple game profiles.

productAttributes.productDescription:
Professional gaming requires high-speed gaming equipment. It’s the perfect tools that enable you to achieve you true potential. With the Black gaming mouse from the house of Tt esports, you can be sure that no matter what the gaming event, you will be on top. The Tt esports Black may seem like a simple mouse from the outside, but it has a ton of features inside. The laser mouse is designed for gamers who like nothing but the best. The mouse is compatible with a variety of operating systems like Windows 7 Vista or XP.

Body

The Tt esports Black has a sleek and stylish look. The mouse is equipped with rubber coating that gives you superior grip, even during extended sessions of gaming. In fact, the whole concept behind building this mouse is to provide you with firm grip, no matter what game you are playing. The esports mouse has an anti-slip grip near the thumb rest, giving you additional grip to control game elements.  

The Black mouse has a 1.8 m braided USB cable. The long cable makes it easy to move the mouse without getting it entangled. Built with Teflon feet, the mouse provides you smooth movement. The Tt esports mouse has 6 buttons in total. This includes the usual right- and left-click buttons along with an illuminated scroll wheel. 2 buttons are place just below the scroll wheel. 1 more button is placed on the left side of the mouse, just where you place your thumb.

The mouse has additional features that allow you to add or subtract weight from the mouse. This is helpful in FPS games where you have to keep your mouse rigid till you can nail the perfect shot. You can add up to 22.5 g of extra weight to mouse. The mouse has a dpi indicator and can be easily connected to a computer through an unused USB port. The Tt esports Black mouse has the dimensions of 70 X 40 X 20 mm.

Performance

The 4th button available on the left side of the mouse acts as a hotkey to access previous web pages when browsing. The mouse has a 4000 dpi laser engine that enables it to provide you with precision and accurate detail. Power fluctuations while playing your favourite games won’t be a bother with this mouse as it has a gold-plated USB connector.

Tt esports Black can be used on almost any surface, without any difficulty. The mouse comes with 64 KB of on-board memory that allows you to create 3 gaming profiles. This is helpful as you can set 3 different control arrangements for 3 different games, making it a versatile product.
productAttributes.title: Tt eSPORTS Black USB 2.0 Laser Gaming Mouse Black

productAttributes.productDescription:
Save the world of Sanctuary from the evil overlords in Diablo III or unravel the deathly secrets of professional assassins while playing Assassin’s Creed with the Tt eSPORTS Azurues gaming mouse. The optical mouse has many features that will help you in elevating your gaming experience to the next level. Built for gaming, the Azurues mouse provides optimum feedback and response. The mouse can be used with a variety of operating systems as it is compatible with Windows 7, Vista and XP.

Body

The Azurues has a sleek and stylish look. Equipped with soft rubber coating, the Tt eSPORTS gaming mouse offers superior grip and comfort. This quality of the mouse enables you to use it for long sessions of gaming, without causing any strain to your hands. The Azurues features a weight-in system, allowing you to add or subtract weight from the mouse. This is helpful when you are playing FPS games as you need the mouse to stay at one place, eliminating any unnecessary sliding. You can add up to 13.5 g of extra weight to the gaming mouse.

The Tt eSPORTS has 3 buttons in total. These include the left- and right-click buttons along with an illuminated scroll wheel. You can use the buttons for a long time as they are made with OMRON material, giving them a lifespan of 5 million keystrokes. You need not worry about cables getting entangled when you move the mouse frequently as it comes with a braided USB cable.

To create the perfect game atmosphere, the Tt eSPORTS comes with a pause-break lighting system. The mouse will provide you with smooth movement as it is built with low-friction feet. This is helpful if you frequently move the mouse. The Tt eSPORTS Azurues comes in the dimensions of 67.2 X 38.5 X 126.5 mm. You can easily connect the mouse to your computer through an unused USB port.

Performance

Competing in gaming tournaments requires equipment of variable frequency and sensitivity as the controls are different for each game. The gaming mouse comes with a range of 400 – 1600 dpi. The wide range assists in faster and smoother movement of the mouse.

You can easily switch between different dpi settings by using the dpi switch present at the bottom of the mouse. Power fluctuations won’t hamper the performance of the Azurues mouse as it comes with a gold-plated USB connector. You can use the mouse on almost any surface, without any hassle.
productAttributes.title: Tt eSPORTS Azurues USB 2.0 Optical Gaming Mouse Black

Description

Based off the critically acclaimed Xai gaming mouse, the SteelSeries Sensei is a top of the line laser gaming mouse dedicated to suiting tournament level players. It features a highly sophisticated firmware that allows for multiple adjustments of the sensor functionality, as well as complex macros to customize the mouse to the users specific desires. With the SteelSeries Engine and illumination present on the design, the Sensei has a new look, both on the outside and on the inside. At the same time though, the Sensei still retains all the features that the original Xai is known for such as its ambidextrous design, the ability to save different profiles on board, and the LED panel to customize the mouse on the fly.

Features

  • Programmable macro buttons
  • Ambidextrous shape
  • Driverless plug-and-play
  • User defined bitmaps for the on- mouse LCD
  • SteelSeries ExactSens
  • SteelSeries FreeMove
  • Menu system on the mouse
  • SteelSeries ExactAim
  • 7 programmable buttons
  • SteelSeries ExactLift
  • Gold-plated USB connector
  • 16 million colors of illumination
  • Three zone lighting - Scroll Wheel, CPI Indicator, and Logo

productAttributes.productDescription:
Introduction

  • A Pure Gaming Experience
    The Xornet gaming mouse is lightweight, ergonomically designed and forged with a reassuringly solid design. It is built for professional FPS gamers that prefer a claw grip. Engineered to execute precise in-game tactics, Xornet comes loaded with a high-performance 2000 DPI sensor that includes on-the-fly adjustment, an ultra-step wheel encoder - providing extremely accurate scrolling, and Japanese-made Omron micro-switches that are meant to endure up to five million clicks. Presented in a eye-catching crimson stealth black high-gloss finish, Xornet lends its truly breathtaking appeal as the focal point of a gamers setup.

Features

  • Precision Anti-Drift Control Sensor
    Xornet utilizes the latest high performance optical engine ensuring extreme stability and reliability. Based on an anti-drift architecture, it delivers stable and precise tracking in mouse lift and drop scenarios. Angle snapping can be enabled or disabled for exact swift crosshair movements enabling amazing skill-shots and incredible aiming accuracy.

  • Omron Micro Switches 5 million clicks
    Only the best is good enough! Omrons patented ultra tactile micro switches enable unsurpassed tactile feedback and speed. You will be able to reach an incredible amount of clicks per second while still feeling and controlling every single click. Omron guarantees a minimum amount of 5 million clicks for these highest grade switches, giving Xornet an extended life-span even for hardcore gamers.

  • DPI On the Fly
    Conveniently placed under the scroll wheel, you can switch the DPI resolution between 500, 1000 and 2000 within an instant.

  • Rubberized Anti-Slip Design
    A Special sweat proof rubber compound on both sides of Xornet gives you maximum grip. Even in heated hour long matches and during quick lift and drop moves you retain full control while repositioning and racing Xornet over the mousepad.
productAttributes.title: Cooler Master CM Storm Xornet Mouse USB 2.0 Optical Gaming Mouse

productAttributes.productDescription:
The dark war between the Autobots and Decepticons comes to Earth. Prepare for battle with the Razer DeathAdder Transformers 3 Collectors Edition. Choose one of four versions designed in the striking finishes of iconic Transformers - the fiery red and blue power of Optimus Prime, the bright and energetic yellow of Bumblebee, the dark brooding purple of Shockwave, or the cold silver evil of Megatron.

As a gaming mouse, the Razer DeathAdder is crafted with a right-handed ergonomic form factor for extended gaming sessions in absolute comfort. Its 3500dpi 3.5g infrared sensor ensures your every movement is translated into frags of pinpoint accuracy. The Razer DeathAdder Transformers 3 Collectors Edition is truly more than meets the eye.

Ergonomic Right-Handed Design
Long after your opponents skill is eroded by hours of gaming, the Razer DeathAdders ergonomic right-handed design provides optimum comfort for intense and extended gameplay that keeps you at your sharpest.

3500dpi Razer Precision 3.5G infrared sensor
Kill what youre aiming at with the new 3500dpi Razer Precision 3.5G infrared sensor that arms you with 4x more precision than a standard 800dpi mouse.

1000Hz Ultrapolling
A response time of 1ms, as compared to that of 125Hz / 8ms found in conventional gaming mice, gives you the competitive edge over your opponents with faster feedback between the Razer DeathAdder and your computer so your movements are executed instantaneously.

Features

  • 3500dpi Razer Precision 3.5G infrared sensor
  • Ergonomic right-handed design
  • 1000Hz Ultrapolling / 1ms response
  • Five independently programmable Hyperesponse buttons
  • On-The-Fly Sensitivity adjustment
  • Always-On mode
  • 16-bit ultra-wide data path
  • 60120 inches per second and 15g of acceleration
  • Zero-acoustic Ultraslick mouse feet
  • Gold-plated USB connector
  • Seven-Foot, lightweight, braided fiber cable
  • Approximate Size : 127 mm / 5.00 inch Length x 70 mm / 2.76 inch Width x 44 mm / 1.73 inch Height
  • Approximate Weight: 148 g / 0.33 lbs

System Requirements

  • PC / Mac with USB port
  • Windows 7 / Windows Vista / Windows XP or Mac OS X v10.4 and above
  • Internet connection for driver installation
  • At least 35MB of hard disk space

Take the lead and lose the wire with the top-of-the-range R.A.T. 9. The power and performance of the R.A.T. 7 combine with next-generation wireless technology for an unsurpassed gaming experience.

  • Zero Latency 2.4Ghz Wireless Technology - A staggering 1ms response time ensures that your lightning fast reactions remain lightning fast.
  • Wireless Receiver/Recharge Dock - Keeps gaming for as long as the gamer, the R.A.T. 9 is a 24/7 wireless beast, shipping with 2 custom built lithium-ion battery cells. One powers the R.A.T. while the other one charges in the dock, allowing the gamer to perform a hot swap whenever and wherever needed.. Up to 9 hours continuous gaming ,Up to 4 days normal use.
  • Perfect your grip - How do you hunt? Whether you palm the mouse or claw it, the R.A.T. can quickly and easily adapt by adjusting in length to suit your hand size and grip style. In addition, the Thumb Panel of the R.A.T. 9 moves forwards, backwards, and pivots outwards, giving you perfect positioning for effortless gaming.
  • Custom Weight System - Like it light or heavy? Maybe you change the weight to suit your game? No matter, the R.A.T. has you covered. Five 6-gram weights can be added or subtracted in an instant, giving you the perfect weight for a perfect feel. When not in use, the weights can be safely stored in the supplied Weight Storage Container and kept safe in the supplied Charging Dock.
  • Precision Aim Mode - Hit your target the first time every time. Use the ST Programming Software to set your desired Precision Aim speed mouse sensitivity, then hold down the Precision Aim button to slow down mouse movement to a level that works for you. A deadly weapon that will hit your enemy where it hurts.
  • 5600 DPI - Featuring a new generation twin eye laser sensor that reads each axis separately for pinpoint accuracy, the R.A.T. 9 tracks up to a stunning 6 meters per second. Pro gamers who favor low sensitivity with high movement speed preferences will always experience correct tracking and precision.
  • 4 Custom DPI Settings - Use the Rocker Switch to toggle between your custom DPI settings
  • 5 Programmable Buttons - Combine your Programmable Buttons with 2 regular left and right mouse buttons and give yourself a total of 7 buttons available to punish your competition. Assign your choice of key gaming actions to Programmable Buttons to create your own custom profiles.
  • 3 Cyborg Modes - Toggle between three individual R.A.T. modes at the touch of a button. Change sensitivity or Programmable Button actions in an instant and gain immediate access to a mind-boggling 15 commands!
  • Powerful ST Programming Software - Change your DPI, cursor sensitivity, create custom profiles for each game, and assign commands to your Programmable Buttons. Easy, quick and the power you need right on your desktop.
  • Lightweight Metal Chassis - Strong yet nimble, the solid metal frame forms the core of the R.A.T. 9 for enhanced rigidity.

productAttributes.productDescription:
Explore the dangerous world of Sanctuary and rise up to a become a new generation hero by playing Diablo 3 with the Diablo III gaming mouse from the house of SteelSeries. Packed with plenty of features, the laser mouse will give you an enjoyable gaming experience every time. Designed exclusively for Diablo III, the mouse will prove to be a valuable addition to your gaming arsenal. The gaming mouse is compatible with a variety of operating systems such as Windows 7, Vista, XP and the Mac OS X. 

Body

The Diablo III mouse has a sleek and stylish build. The mouse is ergonomically built, allowing you to use it for extended gaming sessions. Featuring an ambidextrous design, the Diablo gaming mouse can be used by both left-handed as well as right-handed users, without any difficulty. The gaming mouse has 8 buttons in total. These include the left- and right-click buttons along with an illuminated scroll wheel. The dpi rocker lies behind the scroll wheel. 2 buttons are placed on the left side, near the thumb rest. 2 more buttons are available on the right side of the mouse.

You can easily connect the mouse to your computer through a USB port. The Diablo III has configurable LED lighting. The addition of this feature allows you to change the LED color on the mouse. The switches on the mouse are made from high-grade Omron material, giving them a life-span of 10 million clicks. You need not worry about the wires getting entangled with the Diablo mouse as it comes with a long 2.5 m double-braided nylon cord.

Performance

You can easily change the dpi settings on the mouse with a single click through the dpi rocker. This is helpful while playing RTS games where you have to constantly change dpi settings, based on the environment you are playing in. Out of the 8 buttons available in the Diablo III mouse, 7 are customizable. This is a useful feature as you can set the controls you prefer, without having to change them every time. The Diablo gaming mouse has a powerful 5700 dpi Avago laser sensor. This supplies the mouse with more speed and quicker movement.

Power fluctuations won’t be a bother with the SteelSeries Diablo III as it has a gold-plated USB connector. The mouse can be used on almost any surface. The software supplied with the mouse allows you to create different profiles through which you can control the LED lighting and sound support.
productAttributes.title: Steelseries Diablo III USB 2.0 Best-in-class Technology Mouse

productAttributes.productDescription:
Enter into a world of new gaming possibilities with the Logitech Gaming Mouse G300. The optical mouse provides optimal precision and can be used for a variety of activities like gaming, image editing and 3D modelling. The mouse is compatible with an array of operating systems like Windows 7, Vista and XP, making it easy to use as soon as you switch it on.

Body

The Logitech G300 has a classy and a futuristic design. The mouse has smooth matte finish that does not attract stains and smudge marks. This makes it easy to handle the mouse as you don’t have to worry about constantly cleaning it. The G300 provides superior grip as it is equipped with rubberized coating. This is helpful as you can enjoy extended gaming sessions, without worrying about any discomfort or fatigue.

The mouse has 9 programmable buttons in total. These include right- and left-click buttons along with the scroll wheel. Just below the scroll wheel are 2 buttons. 2 more buttons are available on either side of the left- and right-click buttons. The buttons are smooth to press and provide accurate feedback. The mouse boasts of an ambidextrous design. This feature makes it easy for both right and left-handed users to use the mouse without any discomfort.

The G300 can be easily connected to your computer through a USB port. The Logitech mouse has customizable lights that can change color according to your preference. There are eight light colors to choose from, making it a visually appealing product.

Performance

The buttons available in the Logitech G300 provide extensive usability as they can be customised according to your preference. This gives you more freedom to access functions within games and other applications. The mouse has a wide 2500 dpi sensor, giving it speed and faster movement. Built with 1000 Hz polling, the G300 has a 1 ms response time. This feature assists you in intense gaming matches as you can be ready every second and complete objectives successfully.

The mouse can be used on almost any surface, without any problem. The G300 can be configured as it supports 3 on-board game profiles. This allows you to activate a different profile for each game, based on your necessities, making it a nifty addition to your gaming arsenal.
productAttributes.title: Logitech G300 Gaming USB 2.0 Mouse

productAttributes.productDescription:
You may be staking out the deserts of Sahara to take out that one vital enemy in the Battlefield series or you may be trying to find a new way of life in Fallout: New Vegas. No matter what your objectives in a game, you need gaming equipment that promptly responds to your commands. The SteelSeries Kana mouse is built just for that – to provide you with quick response.

The optical mouse has an array of features that will surprise you every time you play a game. Targeted towards gamers, the mouse delivers optimum speed and precision, allowing you to improve your gaming skills. The mouse is compatible with a variety of operating systems and can be used with Windows 2000, XP, Vista, Windows 7 and Mac OS X.

Body

The Kana gaming mouse has a sleek and compact body. The SteelSeries mouse has an ergonomic design that allows you to use it for hours, without feeling any discomfort to your hands or fingers. Both right-handed as well as left-handed users can use the mouse without any difficulty as the Kana has an ambidextrous design.

The Kana has 6 buttons in total. These include the usual left- and right-click buttons along with an illuminated scroll wheel. The cpi rocker is available behind the scroll wheel. 1 button is available on the left side of the mouse, just where you place the thumb. 1 more button is available on the right side of the mouse.

Coming in the dimensions of 64 X 37 X 124 mm, the Kana weighs 72 g. Equipped with a 2 m anti-tangle braided cord, the Kana mouse is easy to set up as you don’t have to worry about cables getting entangled. You can expect smooth movement from the mouse as it has high performance UPE material mouse feet. You can easily connect the mouse to your computer using the USB port.

Performance

The buttons available in the Kana mouse are programmable. This allows you to set your own controls for the games you are playing, giving you more freedom to experiment. The SteelSeries mouse has a cpi range of 400 - 3200. The wide range of the cpi makes the mouse faster and assists in providing good feedback.

Equipped with 1000 Hz polling, the SteelSeries Kana has a 1 ms response time. The faster response rate is helpful when you play RTS games as you need to assign quick commands to win the game. You can use the mouse on almost any surface, without any difficulty. The SteelSeries Engine present in the Kana mouse allows you set custom CPI settings, tune the LED’s intensity, set polling rate and create multiple profiles.
productAttributes.title: Steelseries Kana USB 2.0 Optical Mouse White

The optical mouse has many features to improve your gaming experience. Targeted towards casual gamers, the mouse provides you with optimum precision, every time. The mouse is compatible with a variety of operating systems such as Windows 2000, XP, Vista, Windows 7 and the Mac OS X.

Body

These include the usual left- and right-click buttons along with a scroll wheel. 1 more button is located behind the scroll wheel that and acts like a cpi rocker.

The unique feature about the buttons is that they are made from tournament grade Omron material. This assists the buttons in delivering you with optimum and precise feedback. Equipped with a 2 m anti-tangle braided cord, the Kinzu V2 provides you with enhanced durability. This feature is especially helpful for those who constantly keep moving their mouse.

Weighing just 77 g, the SteelSeries Kinzu V2 comes in dimensions of 64 X 36 X 117 mm. You can easily connect the mouse to your computer through a USB port. The Kinzu will smoothly slide across any surface as it has high performance UPE material mouse glides.

Performance

The buttons available on the SteelSeries Kinzu gaming mouse are programmable. You can easily toggle between different cpi settings using the cpi toggle switch. This is helpful during gaming tournaments where you have to change cpi settings on the fly. The SteelSeries Kinzu V2 has a cpi range of 400 - 3200. The wide range assists in giving you optimized stability and faster movement. Equipped with 1000 Hz polling, the mouse can give you a blistering fast 1 ms response time.

You can use the mouse on almost any surface, without any difficulty. The SteelSeries Engine present in the Kinzu V2 pro edition gaming mouse allows you set custom CPI settings, track button usage statistics, change polling rates and create multiple profiles.

productAttributes.productDescription:
Defeat the aliens who have launched a surprise attack on Earth in Crysis 2 or win the FIFA world cup while playing FIFA 2012 with the Tt eSPORTS Black gaming mouse. The laser gaming mouse has a ton of features that will aid you in becoming a veteran gamer.

The eSPORTS mouse is built for enthusiast gamers who like competing in games at a professional level. You can connect the mouse to your computer as soon as you pull it out of the box as it is compatible with Windows 7, Vista and XP.

Body

The Tt eSPORTS Black has a sleek and stylish body. Equipped with industrial grade rubber coating, the mouse offers superior comfort and grip. This is helpful when you are at a LAN party or a gaming competition as you can play extended sessions, without any difficulty.

The Combat White edition of the mouse comes with a weight-in system. This allows you to add or subtract weight from the mouse. This feature is a huge assist when you are playing FPS games as the mouse won’t unnecessarily slide. You can add up to 22.5 g of additional weight to the mouse.

The Tt eSPORTS Black gaming mouse has 6 buttons in total. These include the usual left- and right-click buttons along with an illuminated scroll wheel. 2 buttons are placed behind the scroll wheel. One more button is etched on the left side of the mouse, just where you place your thumb. You need not worry about cables getting entangled as the Black mouse comes with a 1.8 m braided USB cable.

The Tt eSPORTS Black will provide you with smooth movement, as it is equipped with Teflon feet. You can easily view the dpi level set on the mouse through the dpi indicator. The Black gaming mouse comes in dimensions of 70 X 40 X 120 mm. You can easily connect the mouse to your computer through a USB port.

Performance

You can easily change the dpi levels on the mouse through the 2 buttons available behind the scroll wheel. These buttons are strategically placed as you need not even look at the mouse to change the settings. Built with a wide range 400 – 4000 dpi sensor, the Tt eSPORTS gaming mouse gives you faster movement. Power fluctuations will not be a bother as the Tt eSPORTS Black is equipped with a gold-plated USB connector.

The Black mouse comes with an internal memory of 64 KB, allowing you to create up to 3 gaming profiles. This is helpful when you are competing in gaming tournaments as you have to constantly change controls while playing different games. The mouse can be used on almost any surface, without any difficulty.

productAttributes.productDescription:
Gamers are only as good as their skill and hardware. This in turn reflects on their overall performance during tournaments and high profile matches that happen across the world. Most gamers are very particular about the equipment and hardware that they use. The precision required for high profile gamers who make a living based on professional gaming is very demanding. A few companies produce quality hardware that manage to withstand the stress and wear and tear involved in hardcore gaming and Razer is one of them.

The Razer Taipan Expert Ambidextrous Mouse is designed to deliver top notch performance with its 8200 dpi 4G dual sensor system. This enables you to perform difficult maneuvers and high precision headshots to get you ahead of your competition. High speed movements are also possible thanks to the high level 8200 dpi mouse. The Ambidextrous design of the Taipan allows you to use any hand for primary control and the buttons can be reconfigured based on which hand you prefer to use. The ergonomic make and feel of the mouse allows the hardware to mould naturally to any type of hand depending on the wielder’s comfort level. Professional gamers have varying styles and tactics that ultimately depend on the input device’s versatility and build quality. The mouse is ideally suited for any type of user, some prefer to use the south-paw grip for controlling, or even the fingertip grip style. The well designed body of the mouse ensures that everyone gets a comfortable grip and minimal fatigue that usually arises out of prolonged use.

The Razer Synapse 2.0 technology that powers the mouse provides unmatched cutting edge support by way of the proprietary software that enhances the Taipan’s superior hardware. The Taipan can seamlessly connect to the cloud service to download updates and keep your personal settings up to date. The Razer Taipan Expert Ambidextrous Mouse has 9 programmable buttons that can be mapped to provide you the quickest responses in times of need. The Razer Taipan is symmetrically designed to ensure that the mouse can be handled by both right handed players and left handed ones. The high precision laser technology incorporated into the Taipan allows for high speed acceleration without compromising on accuracy.

productAttributes.productDescription: SteelSeries Iron Lady Ikari Mouse with Iron lady mousepad : Developed over a 15 month period through the feedback of more than 5.000 competitive gamers across three continents.The SteelSeries Ikari Iron lady Laser mouse is the only device to allow for hardware-based counts per inch CPI adjustments in increments of one, allowing for precise adjustments through the mouse directly not via the PC, with a small LCD screen located on the bottom of the device which displays CPI. Allows the user to play without any interpolation from bloated mouse drivers or game software. The drivers are embedded in the mouse, allowing for quick set-up during tournament or home play. Operating at 500 Hz, this Laser mouse boasts an industry leading 40.000 samples per second which is several times faster than the nearest competing mouse. This allows for quicker refresh speeds, which enables more accurate and precise movements, which is especially important in the heat of tournament battles.The iron.lady QcK pink mousepad is made of high quality cloth material, providing a precise and consistent glide. productAttributes.productDescription:
Playing RTS games requires skill, precision and speed. You have to be faster, quicker and smart while making your decisions, because those are the only qualities that will help you to a win. To do all this, you require gaming equipment that obey your commands perfectly; like the Inferno gaming mouse from the house of Cooler Master. The laser mouse has an array of features that will enhance your gaming experience to the next level. Built for gaming, the Inferno is compatible with a variety of operating systems such as Windows XP and Vista.

Body

The Inferno has a sleek and futuristic look. The gaming mouse is ergonomically designed to provide you with good comfort and superior grip, even during long hours of gaming sessions. The mouse has a right-handed design. Weighing 161.5 g, the Inferno mouse has the dimensions of 80 X 135 X 40 mm. the mouse can be easily connected to the computer through a USB port. You can easily check the dpi settings on the mouse as it comes with a dpi indicator.

The Cooler Master Inferno has 11 buttons in total. These include the usual left- and right-click buttons along with a scroll wheel. 3 buttons are placed behind the scroll wheel. 1 button is placed on either side of the left-click and right-click buttons. 3 more buttons are placed on the left side of the mouse, just where you place the thumb.

Performance

You can rapidly fire multiple rounds in a game as quick as you want, as the Inferno comes with a Rapid Fire Tactical key. From the 11 available buttons on the Cooler Master mouse, 9 are independently programmable. This allows you to change controls for different games and use them the way you deem fit. The Inferno has a 4000 dpi Storm Tactical twin laser sensor, giving the mouse faster and quicker movement.

With 1000 Hz polling, the mouse is capable of giving you a 1 ms response time. This is helpful when you are playing FPS and RTS games. You can use the mouse on almost any surface. The Cooler Master Inferno has 128 KB of Sentinel-X on-board memory, allowing you to create up to 3 different game profiles.
productAttributes.title: Cooler Master Inferno USB 2.0 Gaming Mouse

The CM Storm Spawn removes the limiters; will you be able to keep up?

productAttributes.productDescription:
Rarely do we see manufacturers lead the way in developing environmentally friendly products that are cost effective and functionally effective. Logitech has been a pioneer in making innovative computer peripherals that are easy to use and versatile. The Logitech K750 Solar Wireless Keyboard is an affordable device that will continue to save you more money as it does need new batteries every few months and also does not run on electricity from your system. The body of the Logitech K750 Solar Wireless Keyboard is made of eco-friendly material that is devoid of PVC and the packaging is fully recyclable.

The Logitech K750 Solar Wireless Keyboard gives you the option of working or playing from more places than a normal wired keyboard. The K750 Keyboard connects to your computer by way of the advanced 2.4 GHz wireless radio frequency that eliminates actuation delays, dropouts and interference. The tiny Logitech Unifying Receiver needs to be fit into an empty USB slot on your computer to receive the signals from the K750. The Unifying Receiver is able to connect up to 6 Logitech devices to your computer at the same time which reduces the number of USB slots being occupied by other computer peripherals.

The K750 allows you to work or play from a distance of 10 m which allows you to multitask especially when you have more than one thing to do. The Logitech K750 Solar Wireless Keyboard charges itself through 2 solar panels which are located on the top above all the keys. Never worry if you don’t get sunlight in your room as the rechargeable batteries also get charged by the overhead lights in your room. The keyboard can work for up to 3 months in total darkness once it is recharged fully.

Style and Portability

The Logitech K750 Solar Wireless Keyboard has a thickness of 1.91 cm which is one of the thinnest keyboards in the market today. The K750’s has a stylish look with sleek lines and a streamlined appearance that adds to the visual appeal of your workspace. Since you can connect this keyboard any type of computer with a USB port you can use the same Logitech Keyboard at work and at home. The glossy black mirrored finish and the low profile keycaps make working on this laptop easy as your hands move freely without any hindrance.

The PerfectStroke Key design of the Logitech K750 Solar Wireless Keyboard ensures that there is a distance of 3.2 mm between each key which allows you to type fast without making any errors. The uniform tactile feedback across the concave key surface feels like a laptop keyboard while being more ergonomically designed to suit the natural posture of your hand. The keys are also fluid and very quiet which allows you to use it comfortably without disturbing anyone.

Performance and Battery Features

The Logitech K750 Solar Wireless Keyboard is a plug and play device that can be paired up with any computer with a USB port quickly, as there is no need to install any software. The K750 Keyboard is compatible with computers running on Windows XP, Vista or 7. You never have to worry about your keyboard running out of charge as it will charge itself with whatever light is available. The Logitech Solar App shows if the K750 is getting enough light at any given time. This app also provides you with tips on how to boost how much energy is being generated by your keyboard.

The Lux Meter lets you know how much power your light source is providing by lighting up a green smiley when it is powered up and a red frown if the light source is drawing less than 50 Lux. All in all, this keyboard is very good for everyday use and you know that you have done your part to reduce your carbon footprint.

productAttributes.productDescription:
Everyone has to work but doing work the smart way makes a difference. Adjusting certain aspects of your busy day helps to enhance your performance level and enables you to meet deadlines with ease. Going wireless is the next stage of electronic evolution where being able to enter and receive information while being away from your desk is becoming increasingly easier and convenient. Logitech has introduced a new range of computer peripherals that make work a little less taxing and a little more relaxing.

The K340 Wireless Keyboard from Logitech is wireless device with a simple layout that allows you to get work done faster from anywhere in the room. The K340 uses an advanced 2.4 GHz wireless system to ensure seamless and uninterrupted connection to your computer while registering every actuation onscreen the moment the key is pressed. The innovative Logitech Unifying receiver must be connected to an available USB port to connect this keyboard.

The Unifying receiver helps you keep other USB ports free for connecting other devices as it can connect up to 6 Logitech devices simultaneously. The receiver is so small that once connected there is no need to remove it when you move around. The receiver also comes with an extender cable that lets you position it next to your monitor to receive better signals.

Style and Portability

The Logitech K340 Wireless Keyboard is designed to save space on the desktop while still managing to include all the functionality of a full sized keyboard. The front of the K340 has a slim design while the back is thicker, which provides the keyboard with a nice angle to type on. The smaller size makes it easy to store and transport without compromising on comfort or productivity. The keys are easily visible even when working in low light conditions as the red backlight feature provides illumination around the keys.

The keys of the K340 Keyboard are of regular size and Logitech has also managed to retain the entire Number Pad on the right side. The direction keys have been adjusted to fit under the QWERTY pad so that it does not take up any additional space. This slim Logitech keyboard ensures you have enough space on your desktop and also makes typing on laptops easy due to the low profile keys that allow you to shift your hands and wrists to a more neutral position.

Performance, Multimedia and Connectivity

The Logitech K340 Wireless Keyboard comes with programmable keys that allow you to open your favourite or commonly used applications at the press of a button. This Logitech Keyboard works on computers that run on Windows 7, Vista or XP. The Function Keys on the K340 have been paired up with some commonly used applications and multimedia functions. The dual functions of the Function keys can be activated by pressing the key marked FN in red on the bottom right of the keyboard.

The dual functions of F1 to F4 include Home, direct mail access, search options and calculator. F5 to F11 have dual multimedia functions that let you directly control playback options from the keyboard while also allowing you to mute and increase or decrease the volume. The Logitech K340 is powered by 2 AA batteries that can last up to 3 years if used under normal circumstances. The K340 Keyboard automatically shuts down after 10 minutes of no activity in order to conserve battery power.

The Logitech K340 has a battery indicator on the top right side of the keyboard which lets you know when to change the batteries for a pair of fresh ones. The Logitech K340 Wireless Keyboard also has an on/off switch located on the right rear side which allows you to switch off the keyboard to further conserve battery power. The minimum system requirements to install the K340 Wireless Keyboard are a computer with USB port, Windows OS and an internet connection to download the necessary software.
productAttributes.title: Logitech K340 Wireless Standard Keyboard Black

productAttributes.productDescription:
Work is stressful enough without adding uncomfortable and cumbersome computer peripherals to deal with. Making some changes to your work environment will improve your production and you will get more done without feeling overworked. After the immense success of the Windows operating system, Microsoft branched into making computer peripheral that would complement the Windows operating system and make using computers a delight.

The Microsoft ARC Keyboard is designed to be the perfect companion to your computer as it lets you work and play without any boundaries and restrictions. The clean and modern design of the ARC Keyboard gives it a futuristic feel that you’ll be proud to display to your friends and guests. This compact keyboard can be carried around and used comfortably within a radius around the transceiver. The Microsoft ARC Keyboard connects to your computer by way of a Nano transceiver that fits into a USB 2.0 port. The wireless ARC keyboard and the transceiver works on a 2.4 GHz radio frequency that ensures everything you key into the keyboard will be actuated on screen.

Style and Portability

The Microsoft ARC Keyboard has dimensions of 331 x 153.9 x 21.6 mm and weighs only 351 g which makes it easy and comfortable to take the keyboard anywhere. When transporting the keyboard all you have to remember is to disconnect the transceiver and store it safely in the stowage area under the ARC Keyboard. This lightweight ARC keyboard does not have a Num Pad in order to reduce the footprint of the keyboard. The QWERTY Keys have a lifespan of 5,000,000 actuations per key and is designed to be durable.

Performance

The transceiver of the Microsoft ARC Keyboard has a reliable wireless radius of 9 metres or 30 feet within which you can use the keyboard to work or play. The Microsoft ARC Keyboard works best with computers that run Windows 7, Vista, XP or Mac OS X version 10.4 or higher. The Function Keys F1 to F6 are paired up with Function Keys F7 to F12 and depending on when you need them you can activate them by pressing the Fn key in the bottom right corner. You can also connect the Microsoft ARC Keyboard to chat on the Microsoft XBOX 360.

To switch the Microsoft ARC Keyboard off all you have to do is press and hold the Fn key along with the Escape Key until the battery light changes. The green battery light will flash 3 times before it goes off, and when you turn it on there will be a long green flash. When the battery light flashes red it means the battery in the ARC keyboard is running low. You can mute, increase or decrease the volume directly from the keyboard by using the volume control keys located on the top right corner.

Battery and Other Features

The Microsoft ARC Keyboard uses 2 AAA alkaline batteries to power itself and under normal circumstances, the batteries will last up to 18 months. The battery light will turn red when it is time to replace your batteries with a pair of fresh ones. The minimum system requirements to install this keyboard are a computer with USB 2.0 port, Windows or Mac OS. The Microsoft ARC Keyboard gives you the freedom to choose where you work from whether at the work desk or just lying down on the couch. You can connect the keyboard either to your desktop or laptop at home or work to make typing a pleasant experience.

productAttributes.productDescription:
Microsoft is the world leader in operating systems for computers the world over and they continue to be innovative by making state-of-the-art products that complement their products. Microsoft has proven that they are able to deliver high quality and high performance products with the release of the Microsoft keyboards, webcams, headsets and mice. Even in the gaming community, Microsoft has carved a name for itself by developing the Xbox consoles, Gaming Keyboards and Mice as well as successful games like Halo.

The Microsoft Wired Desktop 600 Keyboard and Mouse combo is perfect for use at work as its ergonomic design and features will improve your work speed and reduce fatigue from typing in an uncomfortable position. This Microsoft Keyboard and Mouse combo connects to your computer by way of 2 lengthy USB cables. The keyboard and mouse start working as soon as they are plugged in and do not require any driver or software installation.

Style and Portability

The Microsoft Wired Desktop 600 Keyboard and Mouse combo complement each other and make work a little more enjoyable. This Microsoft keyboard has dimensions of 456 x 160 x 42.7 mm when the 2 adjustable feet at the bottom are extended. The mouse has dimensions of 113 x 57.9 x 39.2 mm while fitting perfectly in your hands for swift and easy movement. The Microsoft Wired Desktop 600 keyboard weighs 595 g while the mouse weighs 92.8 g. The lightweight makes it easy to store and transport if the need arises.

The Microsoft Wired Desktop 600 Keyboard allows you to type up to 1000 characters a minute due to its easy flow design that allows your fingers to quickly move from one key to another. This wired keyboard is designed to be spill resistant which means that even if you spill coffee or water on the keyboard, you can let the liquid drip out from under the keys and then wipe it dry with a cloth. The thin-profile keys on the keyboard are designed to be very quiet while being responsive to every key stroke. The QWERTY keypad has a lifespan of 20,000,000 actuations per key which makes this keyboard very durable and a good investment. There is a special Hotkey to launch the calculator, which is one of the most commonly used applications.

The ambidextrous mouse is designed to be comfortable in either the left or right hand. This Microsoft mouse comes with 3 buttons which include the scroll wheel button that can be used to move through documents and webpages quickly. The high performance optical technology used in the Microsoft Wired Desktop 600 Mouse delivers quick and accurate movement on screen. The 800 DPI that the optical sensor delivers provides greater control and accuracy while playing games.

Performance and Connectivity

The Microsoft Wired Desktop 600 Keyboard and Mouse combo are Plug and Play USB devices that start working without installing any software. This feature is extremely useful if you plan on using this Microsoft combo with more than one computer. The Desktop 600 Combo works best on computers that run Windows 7, XP, Vista and Mac OS X or later. The 4 Media Control Hotkeys lets you mute, increase or decrease the volume and control media playback options like play and pause. The minimum system requirements to install this Microsoft Wired Keyboard and Mouse combo are a computer with available USB ports, a CD Drive, 60 MB of available hard disk space and either Windows or Mac OS installed.
