productAttributes.productDescription:
People who are used to typing long emails and doing a lot of research at work need to ensure that their hands are positioned properly to avoid any long term side effects that may require medical treatment in the future. Concerned people should take precautions to minimize the damage done by using ergonomic computer peripherals that are easy-to-use. Most people all around the world use the Windows operating system on their computers to work and play. Microsoft has introduced a range of computer peripherals that complement their operating system well and makes accessing commonly used Windows application a breeze.

The Microsoft Natural Ergo 4000 is an advanced ergonomic keyboard designed to make work stress-free and quick. The Natural Ergo 4000 connects to your computer by way of a wired USB 2.0 interface. Whether you are hard at work or slaying dragons in games, the cutting-edge design of the Microsoft keyboard improves your chance of quickly accomplishing tasks so that you can use the remaining time to relax.

Style and Portability

The Microsoft Natural Ergo 4000 has dimensions of 503 x 262 x 82.8 mm and the keys on the keyboard are divided into 2 sections. The Natural Ergo 4000 weighs 1301 g which gives the keyboard a durable construction and reliable feel. The Num Pad has been improved to make entering numbers for calculations easy and quick. Commonly used symbols like the equals to sign and backspace can be found above the Num Pad for easy access. The integrated padded leatherette wrist rest offers you better support in a plush setting.

The Natural Ergo 4000 from Microsoft allows you to type in total comfort as its ergonomic design encourages you to improve your hand position, which also improves your typing speed. The Gull Wing design of the keyboard improves the way your fingers interact with the keys and allows you to work faster. The QWERTY keys have the standard arrangement that makes it easy to switch to this keyboard from ordinary keyboards. The keys are also designed to be durable as each key has 1,000,000 actuations per key. You can achieve a typing speed of 1000 characters per minute if you have some practice in speed typing. You can take a closer look at documents and webpages by using the intuitive Zoom Slider which is located in the middle of the QWERTY keypad.

Performance and Connectivity

The Microsoft Natural Ergo 4000 comes with customizable hot keys that can be used to speed up the common tasks that you execute on a regular basis. Tasks like opening your email account, opening your documents and downloads folder can be specifically programmed to make your life easier. There are other Internet and Windows applications which have their own button and they can be used to open the calculator, move forward and back on a web page or open your preferred home page with the touch of a button. The F Keys can be locked to avoid engaging them unintentionally while working quickly.

You also have the innovative Taskbar Favourites that let you easily access programs in the taskbar with conveniently placed hot keys. When you move the folder by dragging it, the keyboard automatically adapts to the new location of the applications that have been moved. The Microsoft Natural Ergo 4000 works best on computers that run Windows 7, Vista, XP or Mac OS. The multimedia keys on the Natural Ergo 4000 allow you to quickly and easily access volume controls and media playback options. The minimum system requirements to install this keyboard are a computer with a USB port, Windows or Mac OS, 100 MB of available hard disk space and a CD-ROM.
productAttributes.title: Microsoft B2M-00009 Natural Ergo 4000 USB 2.0 Standard Keyboard Black

productAttributes.productDescription:
People who work on computers at home or in the office know how much their hands hurt after long sessions of typing due to poor typing posture and hand positioning. Most people just ignore this fact and continue to work till it becomes a serious issue and by that time, the treatment might cost more or you’ll have to take days off work to recover. So if your work involves you typing or researching a lot on a computer, it is important to get an ergonomic keyboard to reduce the strain on your hand and to make work more pleasant.

 The Microsoft Natural Ergonomic 4000 was developed after extensive research with leading ergonomic experts to ensure you have the most comfortable hand positioning while you pound away on your keyboard day after day. The Microsoft Natural Ergonomic 4000 tries to correct the way your wrist and hand is positioned to ensure you work or play better. Unnatural positioning of the hand also reduces your work speed and fatigues you faster. At first sight the Microsoft Natural Ergonomic 4000 looks a bit strange due to the layout of keys but it is designed to provide a natural angle for your hand. This cutting-edge keyboard is connected to your computer by way of a USB 2.0 cable. 

Style and Portability

The Microsoft Natural Ergonomic 4000 has dimensions of 503 x 262 x 82.8 mm which is large for a keyboard, but the ergonomic features that constitute the additional space are worth it when you consider how comfortable this keyboard is to use. The curved key bed and the natural arc are examples of how the usability and ergonomic experts at Microsoft made this Microsoft Keyboard more intuitive, comfortable and user-friendly. Commonly used symbols like the equals to sign, brackets and Backspace have additional keys assigned to them and they are placed above the Number Pad for easy access.

The gable design of the Microsoft Natural Ergonomic 4000 keeps your forefingers higher than your little fingers which allow you to adopt a natural position while typing. There are 107 keys on this Microsoft Keyboard with dedicated keys for various Windows and Internet shortcuts. The integrated palm rest offers greater support while you work due to its plush cushioned surface. This Microsoft Keyboard has a reverse slope that helps your hand and wrists rest naturally for greater comfort while you work.

Performance and Connectivity

The Microsoft Natural Ergonomic 4000 has extra keys that can be customised to open your preferred applications at the press of a button. These hot keys are located on top in the centre and can be used to open your email or access your library documents. This keyboard works well with computers running on Windows XP, 7, Vista, 2000 with SP4 or Mac OS. The Function Keys have dual functions and can be accessed by deactivating the F Lock. The shortcuts are labelled on the F Keys to avoid any confusion and it makes you faster at work as you don’t need to use your mouse to get things done.

While playing music or videos you can control the volume and playback options directly from the keyboard. The Media Keys and the mute button are located on the right side of the Hot Keys. The novel zoom button is located in the centre of the Microsoft Natural Ergonomic 4000 and can be used to zoom in and out of documents and webpages. The minimum system requirements to install this Microsoft Keyboard are a computer with a USB port, Windows or Mac OS, CD-ROM drive and 60 MB of hard disk space.
productAttributes.title: Microsoft Natural Ergonomic 4000 USB 2.0 Standard Keyboard

productAttributes.productDescription:
Microsoft Windows is the most used operating system for computers in the world and they keep reinventing themselves by branching out into various other consumer products like the XBOX 360 for gaming, operating system for phones and computer peripherals that are ergonomically designed for enhanced comfort. Innovative computer peripherals like ergonomic keyboards, precision mice and high definition webcams are designed to easily connect to the Windows Operating System and start working almost immediately. The Microsoft Desktop 800 Wireless Keyboard and Mouse combo is perfect for use at work as they complement each other in style and performance.

The Microsoft Desktop 800 Wireless Keyboard and Mouse combo connects to your computer by way of a receiver that needs to be plugged into a USB 2.0 port. The secure wireless connection uses the 2.4 GHz technology to ensure proper connection and data transfer. The Wireless keyboard and mouse can be used within a radius of 30 feet from the receiver, which gives you enough leg room to relax on your couch while you work on the computer. Any time you want to transport this portable keyboard and mouse, all you have to do is disconnect the receiver from the USB port and fix it underneath the mouse in its designated stowage area. This feature ensures that the receiver is safely stored and that you can connect it to the next computer and start working right away.

Style and Portability

The dimensions of the Microsoft Desktop 800 Wireless Keyboard are 456 x 158 x 45.7 mm and the mouse is 58 x 113.5 x 39.6 mm. This Microsoft keyboard weighs 1300 grams with the batteries while the mouse weighs 65.9 g inclusive of its batteries. The mouse has an ambidextrous design that can be used by either the left or the right hand. Both the keyboard and mouse are ergonomically designed to improve your work speed and quality of your work as you will make fewer errors.

The Desktop 800 wireless mouse uses Microsoft’s LED optical technology for quick and accurate movement of the cursor. The responsive cursor control takes advantage of the 1000 dots-per-inch DPI tracking system to allow you to move through documents and webpages quickly. The Mouse has 3 buttons which includes the scroll wheel button.

Performance and Connectivity

The Microsoft Desktop 800 Wireless Keyboard and Mouse works best with computers that run on Windows 7, Vista, XP and Mac OS X v10.4 or later. This Microsoft Desktop 800 Wireless keyboard comes with easy access hot keys that allow you to quickly open frequently used tools like the calculator and zoom. Shortcut keys can be used to increase and decrease the volume of your computer directly from the keyboard thereby allowing you to relax in bed while you enjoy your favourite music or movie. The QWERTY keyboard is durable as it can manage 5,000,000 actuations per key.

Battery and Other Features

The Microsoft Desktop 800 Wireless Keyboard needs 2 AAA alkaline batteries to function while the mouse requires 2 AA alkaline batteries. You can avoid your keyboard running out of battery power by keeping an eye on the battery status indicator. When the indicator shines red it is time to replace the batteries with fresh ones. To extend the life of the AA alkaline batteries you can turn the mouse off when you are not using it. Under normal circumstances the batteries will last up to eight months.
productAttributes.title: Microsoft Wireless Desktop 800 USB Keyboard and Mouse Combo
Microsoft Bluetooth 5000 USB 2.0 Standard Keyboard Black

productAttributes.productDescription:
Considering the fact that most people spend a lot of their time in front of computers, it is wise to invest in computer peripherals that deliver good performance while being comfortable to use. Computers are very versatile when it comes to connecting with various peripherals that can enhance your digital experience while remaining cost effective. Selecting the right keyboard and mouse is important as you will be using these devices constantly while working or playing on your computer. The keyboard should have an ergonomic design that does not strain your hand when used for a long time.

Amkette, a leading manufacturer of computer peripherals, has designed the perfect keyboard and mouse combination for the budget shopper. The stylish 2 tone Classic Duo Desktop keyboard and mouse combo from Amkette is considerably light which makes it very portable. The durable build of the keyboard and mouse ensures that you get good value for your money. The Amkette Classic Duo Combo is a wired set of peripherals that can connect to the computer by either the PS/2 port or the USB port.

Style and Performance

The Amkette Classic Duo Desktop Keyboard and Mouse combo is ergonomically designed to reduce strain on your wrist when working long hours. The Classic Duo Keyboard is a full-sized keyboard with the standard 12 Function keys on top. The Laser Printed Characters on the keyboard ensures that the markings stay on the key for a long time even after long-term use. The Number Pad is conveniently located on the right side in order to easily enter numbers when doing calculations. Typing on this Amkette keyboard is a delight due to the soft feel and noiseless keys.

The Classic Duo Desktop Keyboard from Amkette is designed to be spill-proof as it comes with holes in the bottom which allows the liquid to drain away. This feature not only makes cleaning the keyboard easier but also makes it last longer in an office environment. The total number of keys on the Classic Duo Desktop Keyboard is 108 and they have a lifespan of 10 million key strokes. There are 3 tiny bulbs above the Num Pad that light up when the Caps Lock, Num Pad Lock and the Scroll Lock are active. The Zooming function of the Amkette Classic Duo Desktop combo allows you enlarge webpages or documents that you find difficult to read.

Multimedia and connectivity

The Amkette Classic Duo Desktop Keyboard allows you to quickly shut down the computer at the touch of a button. In case you are returning back to your computer soon you also have the option of putting the computer on sleep mode. The third special hot key is the Wake up key that reactivates the computer from sleep mode. The Amkette Classic Duo Desktop Keyboard and Mouse Combo can be installed on computers that run on Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7 or Linux operating system. Alternatively they can also be easily connected to Apple computers that run the Mac OS.

The minimum system requirements to install this Amkette combo are a computer with either PS/2 ports or USB ports and a preinstalled operating system. This Plug and Play design of the keyboard makes it simple to connect to different computers if the need arises. You don’t need to install any software or drivers for this keyboard.
productAttributes.title: Amkette Classic Duo Desktop PS/2 Keyboard and Mouse Combo

productAttributes.productDescription:
Having a comfortable working environment improves the average productivity and improves the quality of life for the employee. Proper equipment that is durable and ergonomic goes a long way to reduce work stress. The Amkette Ash Black Desktop Keyboard and Mouse is a combination designed to tackle the most common requirements of using a computer.

The Amkette Ash Black Desktop Keyboard and Mouse Combo connects to your computer by way of a wired PS/2. This feature allows you to quickly connect the keyboard to any computer as both PS/2 options are available. This Amkette keyboard will help you navigate faster through webpages and makes controlling your entertainment a breeze. The Ash Black Keyboard and Mouse are wired devices that respond swiftly to any actuation of the keys.

Style, Performance and Connectivity

The Amkette Ash Black Desktop Keyboard and Mouse combo is made from high quality ABS Plastic that gives these wired devices an excellent look and finish. The keyboard and mouse are ergonomically designed to reduce the strain on your hand while the delightful shape and elegant curves enhance the visual appeal. The soft feel keys are a delight to type on and once you get used to it you will feel the difference in your typing speed. The improvement in your typing speed will allow you to complete your work faster.

The Amkette Ash Black Wired Keyboard comes with a special key membrane that protects it from dust and spills. If any liquid falls into the keyboard, just tilt the keyboard and let the liquid drip out. The spill-resistant Ash Black Keyboard ensures that it continues working by making sure the liquid does not come in contact with the ICs under each key. Though compact, this wired keyboard comes with a total of 114 keys which include 11 hot keys. The first 4 hot keys are for internet functions like launching your email, opening the Home Page, Refreshing the webpage and search options. The large button in the middle is the play/pause key that lets you control multimedia or entertainment files.

The remaining hot keys include other playback options like stop, next track and previous track. You can also mute, increase or decrease the volume of the computer easily by using the quick access hot keys located on top. The 3 tiny bulbs above the Num Pad, light up to indicate whether the Caps Lock, Num Lock or Scroll Lock is active. The Amkette Ash Black Desktop Mouse is ergonomically designed to fit perfectly in the palm of your hand. The Ash Black Mouse has an optical resolution of 800 DPI which is perfect for office work and for some light gaming online. The mouse comes with 3 buttons including the scroll wheel which can be used to vertically navigate web pages or documents quickly.

The zoom function on the Amkette Ash Black Desktop Keyboard helps you quickly magnify the web page or document you were viewing in order to read more comfortably without straining your eyes. This Amkette Ash Black Desktop Keyboard and Mouse combo works best with computers that run on Windows XP, Vista, 7, Mac or Linux OS. This Amkette Keyboard is durable as it can withstand up to 10 million key strokes.
productAttributes.title: Amkette Ash Black Desktop PS/2 Keyboard and Mouse Combo Black
Amkette Rocker Multimedia RX4 PS/2 Standard Keyboard

productAttributes.productDescription:
Everyone yearns to experience more freedom at work without being restricted to their cluttered cubicle all the time. Wireless technology connects your laptop to the internet through a Wi-Fi network and even allows you to answer calls on your mobile phone. Now you can clear the clutter and gain unrestricted freedom by replacing your existing wired setup for wireless computer peripherals like keyboards, mice and headsets with microphones. Amkette is a major computer peripherals manufacturer that makes innovative and durable products that enhance the digital lifestyle of its consumers.

The Amkette Wireless Keyboard with In-built Mouse is designed for a desk-free experience as the in-built mouse removes the necessity for a table. Now you have total control of the computer from anywhere in the room as Amkette uses the 2.4 GHz Radio Frequency technology to ensure swift and uninterrupted connectivity. The tiny RF receiver has to be plugged into an available USB port to activate it. The Plug and Play technology allows instant functioning of the keyboard and the in-built mouse without installing any software.

Style and Portability

The easy to use Amkette Wireless Keyboard with In-built Mouse is a unique combination of a standard keyboard with an optical trackball mouse. The dimensions of this compact wireless Amkette keyboard are 365 x 156 x 22 mm which make it portable as well. Typing on this Amkette keyboard is smooth due to the quiet nature of the tactile keys. There are a total of 100 keys that have UV-coated key caps for a longer lifespan. The easy-to-use mouse comes with 2 mouse buttons and a scroll button that allows you to swiftly navigate vertically on webpages or documents. There are 2 additional buttons on the extreme left side of the keyboard that also perform the functions of the right and left buttons of the mouse.

Performance and Connectivity

The Amkette Wireless Keyboard With In-built Mouse allows you to relax anywhere in the room as it has an operational distance of 8 to 10 m. The Amkette Wireless Keyboard works well on computer that run on Windows 2000, XP, Vista, 7, Mac OS or Linux OS. The mouse on this Amkette keyboard has an optical resolution of 800 DPI which is perfect for office work and playing quick online games. The mouse uses multiple optical sensors to swiftly and accurately transfer the movements on screen.

The Soft-shut key is the first of the 11 hot keys, and it allows you to quickly put the computer in sleep or hibernate mode when you need to step away. The next five hot keys are easy access multimedia controllers that allow you to increase or decrease the volume, play/pause a file, select next and previous track. This feature allows you to use this keyboard as a remote control when you are watching a movie from the comfort of your couch. The remaining 5 hot keys include opening the home page, My Computer, Search Window and e-mail client.

The Amkette Wireless Keyboard With In-built Mouse requires 2 AAA batteries to function. The state of the art energy saving feature conserves battery charge by activating the smart energy saving mode which puts the keyboard into sleep mode if it has been inactive for 4 minutes. As soon as a key is pressed on the keyboard, it will reactivate itself and be ready for use immediately. The battery level indicator will flash when the batteries are weak and need to be replaced with fresh ones. The minimum system requirements to install this Amkette keyboard are a computer with a USB port, 256 MB of RAM and Windows, Mac or Linux OS.
productAttributes.title: Amkette In-built Mouse Wireless Keyboard Black

productAttributes.productDescription:
Wireless technology has spread its invisible wings to gadgets and devices that we take for granted every day. Gadgets like the smart mobile phones and tablets have become indispensable and people use it to keep updated on news or their social life. Now you can enjoy a similar experience in your work place by going wireless with your computer peripherals. Amkette has introduced a range of high quality and innovative products that have got futuristic look to it.

The Amkette Black Diamond Wireless Keyboard and Mouse Combo is designed to look extremely stylish with a look that conveys it was delicately carved out of a black diamond. The chic glossy finish will add to the visual appeal of your workspace, while giving you the freedom to move around unrestricted by wires. The Amkette Black Diamond Combo uses the energy efficient wireless 2.4 GHz RF system to ensure uninterrupted performance and instant actuation on screen. So go ahead liberate yourself by choosing the Amkette Black Diamond to ensure you get the comfort, convenience and elegance you deserve.

Style and Portability

The Amkette Black Diamond Wireless Keyboard and Mouse Combo is designed to be compact in order to save valuable desktop space. The Wireless RF receiver has to be connected to an available USB port to activate it. A metallic plate has been embedded in the Amkette Black Diamond for extra stability and prevents unwanted movement of the keyboard as you type. The Black Diamond Keyboard and Mouse have dimensions of 365 x 156 x 22 mm and 121 x 62 x 35 mm respectively which make it easy to carry around while working.

The sleek and ergonomic design of the Amkette Black Diamond Wireless Keyboard ensures that you can work for a long time as you can adjust to any position that does not strain you. This Amkette keyboard comes with 112 keys that can perform all the necessary functions and more when compared to a standard office keyboard. The palm-sized mouse comes with 2 buttons and a vertical roller that can help you navigate quickly through webpages or documents. The standard key cap life of the keyboard is 10 million presses while the buttons have a lifespan of 30 million times.

Performance and Connectivity

Once you start using the Amkette Black Diamond Wireless Keyboard and Mouse combo you can sit anywhere in the room and control your computer. The Keyboard and Mouse work perfectly in a radius of 10 m from the tiny RF USB receiver, which gives you plenty of legroom to work comfortably from any angle you choose. The Black Diamond Combo works well with computers that run on Windows XP, Vista, 7, Mac OS or Linux OS. The Mouse has a DPI of 800 which is perfect for office work and some light gaming. Controlling the multimedia and internet applications on your computer has now become simpler with the dedicated hot keys conveniently located on both sides of the keyboard. The mute, volume control, play/pause, next and back hot keys are located on the left side, while the 3 internet keys are situated on the right side.

The Amkette Black Diamond keyboard and mouse is powered by 2 AAA batteries each and uses power-saving circuits to extend the battery life. The low battery indicator starts flashing when the batteries have to be replaced. To conserve energy, the keyboard and mouse enter into a smart energy saving mode or sleep mode after 4 minutes of inactivity. The devices can be activated by pressing any key or button. The minimum system requirements to install the Amkette Black Diamond Combo are a computer with a USB port, 256 MB of RAM and a preinstalled Windows, Mac or Linux operating system.
productAttributes.title: Amkette Black Diamond Wireless Desktop Keyboard and Mouse Combo Black
Amkette CLASSIC DUO USB 2.0 Keyboard and Mouse Combo
Amkette ASH BLACK Keyboard and Mouse Combo Black

productAttributes.productDescription:
Computers are no longer confined to desktops or laptops as newer innovations are taking the functionality of computers to the next level. Newer models of LED televisions come with the necessary ports to connect to your computer with HDMI cables. This allows you to use your television as the screen for all your internet, entertainment and gaming needs. Since it is advisable to sit at a certain distance from a TV screen you will need computer peripherals that either have a long cable or wireless technology. Amkette has stepped in to make the idea of using your television as a home theatre computer a remarkable and simple experience with the Amkette Wi-Key Touch Wireless Keyboard.

Amkette launched the Wi-Key Touch Wireless Keyboard in 2011 and designed it to be an advanced remote control for your computer. As stated in the name the Amkette Wi-Key Touch is a wireless keyboard that has an operational distance of 10 metres and a wireless interface of 2.4 GHz RF. This feature ensures that you can relax on your couch while you enjoy movies, music, photos and games on a bigger screen.

Style and Portability

The Amkette Wi-Key Touch Wireless Keyboard looks like a laptop keyboard without the screen attached to it. The dimensions of this Amkette Wireless Keyboard are 310 x 230 x 20 mm and it is a lightweight device which makes it easy to use. This is the perfect partner for a home theatre based computer as the keyboard can be carried around easily in a radius of 10 m without disconnecting from the system. The Number Pad is removed and integrated into the right side of the alphabet keys. By activating the Num Lock which is located after the Function Keys you can use the Number Pad to enter numbers easily.

Miscellaneous keys like the Page Up, Page Down, Home and End Keys are located on the extreme right side. The Amkette Wi-Key Touch Wireless Keyboard comes with a built-in multi finger laptop style smart touch pad and laptop style tactile keys for smooth typing. There is enough space on both sides of the smart touch pad to rest your wrist while you type, thereby reducing the strain on your hand. There are a total of 88 keys which include the alphabets, symbols, internet shortcuts and multimedia keys.

Performance and Connectivity

The Amkette Wi-Key Touch Wireless Keyboard is compatible to use with a computer, Microsoft Xbox or Sony PlayStation 3. There are 8 multimedia buttons located on top of the keyboard of which 4 are for internet functions like opening your email and search. The remaining four multimedia keys are dedicated to video and audio playback options including volume controls. The Amkette Wi-Key Touch Wireless Keyboard comes with a power saving circuit system which switches the keyboard off if it has been inactive for some time and you can press any key to power the keyboard back up for use. This feature reduces the energy consumed by this wireless keyboard thereby increasing the battery life.

The multi finger laptop style smart touch pad can be controlled by using simple hand gestures to achieve the desired functions of a normal mouse. Tapping one finger on the touch pad signals the left click on a mouse and tapping 3 fingers signals the right click. You can scroll up and down the screen by touching 2 fingers on the touch pad and moving them up or down. To drag and drop items into folders all you have to do is tap the item and without lifting your finger, drag the item to the intended folder. The minimum system requirements to install this keyboard are a computer with USB 1.1 or later, Windows, Mac or Linux OS and 256 MB of available hard disk space.
productAttributes.title: Amkette Wi-Key Touch with Multi Touchpad Wireless Standard Keyboard

productAttributes.productDescription:
Wireless technology has been integrated into most types of machines that we use on a daily basis and take for granted. Unlocking your car at the press of a button, changing the channel on the TV, Wi-Fi backed internet access and getting a call wherever you are on your mobile phone. So why restrict yourself when it comes to your computer, when you can go wireless and enjoy working or playing from anywhere in the room. Amkette has designed innovative products to bridge the gap and the Amkette Cruizer Wireless Keyboard and Mouse Combo does not disappoint.

The Amkette Cruizer Wireless Keyboard and Mouse Combo use the best in technology with the reliable and tested 2.4 GHz wireless solution. The compact and cutting edge design of the Nano Receiver provides instant connectivity without any interruptions. The ultra-small receiver can be left connected to the USB port of a laptop with very little protruding out. This allows you to carry it attached to the laptop to your meetings. You can work on your laptop or desktop while comfortably relaxing on the couch. So go ahead stretch your legs into the future of computer technology and have the ability to control your entertainment and work from anywhere you choose.

Style and Portability

The Amkette Cruizer Wireless Keyboard and Mouse have dimensions of 440 x 176 x 25 mm and 110 x 62 x 29 mm respectively. Though compact the Amkette Cruizer Keyboard still has 111 keys which let you do everything a normal keyboard would and more. The spill resistant design of the Amkette Cruizer Keyboard makes it safe to use around liquids like tea, coffee and juice. In case a spill occurs, all you have to do is tilt the keyboard till all the liquid drips out and then wipe it dry with a cloth. The Cruizer Keyboard has a standard lifespan of 10 million presses while the buttons have 30 million presses.

The Cruizer mouse comes with a protective cover that keeps your mouse hygienic by making it easy to clean. The soft grip cover which is made of silica gel feels very smooth and can be washed if it gets dirty. Easy access hot keys are available for internet and multimedia applications that allow you to use your Cruizer Keyboard as a remote control while watching movies on your computer. You can quickly mute and increase or decrease the volume directly from the keyboard. Open your homepage or launch the search option by simply pressing a single button located above the Function buttons.

Performance and Connectivity

Your personal emails and notes are securely transferred to the computer by use of a 128 bit AES Encryption that is unique to each receiver. You can install this keyboard on computers that run on Windows XP, Vista, 7, Linux and Mac OS. The Cruizer Mouse comes with 3 buttons that include the precision scroll wheel that lets you scroll up and down documents or webpages quickly. The high precision optical sensor generates 1000 DPI which provides accurate and swift response during games and designing.

The Amkette Cruizer Keyboard and Mouse each require 2 AAA batteries to work. The battery level indicator lets you know when you have to replace the batteries with a pair of fresh ones. A manual on/off button and a multi-layered power saving system help conserve the battery charge in order to make them last longer. The auto standby mode puts the keyboard and mouse to sleep when it is not used for a long time. The minimum system requirements to install the Cruizer combo are a computer with a USB port, 64 MB RAM and pre-installed operating system which can be either Windows, Mac OS or Linux. So kickback, relax and enjoy a freedom that can only come from being totally in control while wireless.
productAttributes.title: Amkette Cruizer Wireless Desktop Keyboard and Mouse Combo Black

productAttributes.productDescription:
Computer Gaming has become highly competitive with the latest games adapting a multiplayer format where gamers can face off against other gamers for rewards, glory and bragging rights. Professional gaming requires hours of practise and suitable hi-end gaming gear that will enhance the gameplay speed. SteelSeries is a leading manufacturer of gaming accessories and peripherals which include a range of headsets, keyboards, mice and gaming surfaces that are available in more than 75 countries.

The SteelSeries 6G V2 Keyboard was developed for gamers who love to play First Person Shooter games and Real Time Strategy games that involve a lot of fast action and unexpected twists. Raw performance and durability was the key focus while designing the SteelSeries 6G V2 Keyboard as gamers tend to use excessive pressure on the keyboard while playing. This SteelSeries Keyboard connects to your computer by way of 2 m USB cable with gold-plated connectors to enhance its durability.

Style and Portability

 The SteelSeries 6G V2 Keyboard has dimensions of 250 x 480 x 43 mm and has the standard layout of a normal keyboard with a few exceptions. The durability of this SteelSeries 6G V2 Keyboard lets you carry it to your friend's house for a LAN party or for gaming tournaments. The keys of this SteelSeries keyboard let you type and game faster due to the presence of mechanical switches, which have a travel distance that is roughly 50 per cent shorter than most conventional keyboards.

The 6G V2 Keyboard from SteelSeries delivers a consistent tactile feeling that will help you type faster and improve the number of actions per minute in the games that you play. The Num, Caps and Scroll Lock Keys have indicator lights located on the top right corner of the keyboard that light up in a white glow. All the keys on the SteelSeries 6G V2 Keyboard are mounted on a durable metal inner chassis which makes it physically heavy. The plastic used to make the keyboard contains metal elements to improve the durability and build quality of this 6G V2 Keyboard.

The SteelSeries 6G V2 Keyboard will take some time to get adjusted to, especially for people who are used to non-mechanical keyboards. But once you get acclimated you will notice a considerable improvement in your typing speed due to the responsive tactile feedback and superior response times. The keys have 18 K gold-plated mechanical no-click switches that have to pass strict tolerance levels while manufacturing to ensure you get a keyboard that delivers consistent performance.

The Cherry Black switches increases the lifespan of the SteelSeries 6G V2 Keyboard by 50 million keystrokes. This allows the keyboard to withstand fast fingers, fists and angry smashes to let you get back into the game with full functionality.

Performance and Connectivity

 The SteelSeries 6G V2 Keyboard works best with Windows 7, Vista, XP, 2000, 98 and ME versions. The annoying Windows Key has been replaced by a SteelSeries Key that does not pull up the Windows Menu during intense gameplay. The SteelSeries key is used to activate the dual multimedia functions of the Function keys F1 to F6 making it easier to control your movie and music directly from the keyboard. This feature helped reduce the size of the keyboard as additional keys just for the media functions were not required.

On the SteelSeries 6G V2 Keyboard you can press up to 6 keys at a time when it is connected by USB. But if you opt to use the included USB to PS/2 converter there is no limit to the number of simultaneous key presses you can execute. When the keyboard is connected by the USB port the signals need to be processed by the CPU which is known as polling. But when SteelSeries 6G V2 Keyboard is connected through a PS/2 port there is no polling and all the keys are registered without loss.
productAttributes.title: SteelSeries 6Gv2 Gaming Keyboard

productAttributes.productDescription:
Most people find work cumbersome and difficult because they are not able to adapt to the work environment or tools they have to use. Computers and their peripherals have become significant in everything we do as they are being used for business transactions, designing, editing, making music and medical applications to name a few. Having the proper hardware reduces stress on the employee while enabling him to achieve or exceed his targets. Logitech is a leading computer peripheral manufacturer that makes durable and innovative products.

The Logitech MK100 PS2 Wired Keyboard and Mouse Combo is a perfect team that complements each other, both in build quality and style. The Keyboard in the MK100 wired combo needs an available PS2 port on the computer to connect. The Mouse can be connected to either a USB port or the PS2 port. This feature provides you total flexibility in terms of connectivity when you want to use the MK100 keyboard and mouse combo on another computer system.

Style and Portability

The Logitech MK100 PS2 Keyboard is a compact keyboard designed to save valuable space on your desktop so that you have enough space for the mouse and paperwork. Though compact, the keyboard features full sized keys that are easy to use thereby reducing errors. Logitech prioritized the functionality of the MK100 Keyboard to its appearance and has not wasted any space with unnecessary body extensions. The body of the MK100 keyboard is moulded around the space bar and the direction keys at the bottom.

The Number Pad is located on the extreme right of the keyboard while the Print Screen, Scroll Lock and Pause keys are located above it. The standard Windows Keys are located on either side of the space bar. The indicator lights for the Caps Lock, Scroll Lock and Num Lock are placed after the row of Function Keys on the top. The thin profile of the MK100 Keyboard makes it easy to transport and store if the need arises. The thin profile also helps by allowing your wrists to rest in a neutral position that reduces strain when working long hours. The Logitech MK100 PS2 Keyboard and Mouse combo works on computers that run on Windows XP, 7, Vista and some earlier versions.

The Logitech MK100 PS2 Keyboard is designed to be spill-resistant which means the keyboard is easy to clean even if you spill water or coffee on the keyboard. All you have to do is tilt the keyboard to let all the liquid flow out through a corner and then wipe dry with some tissue paper. This feature also ensures that dust and other dirt particles that fall in between the keys can be cleaned easily. The Mouse of the MK100 combo is a full sized device designed to fit comfortably in the hand while providing precision movement on screen. You can plug the mouse into a PS2 port if you need to free up a USB port.
productAttributes.title: Logitech MK100 PS/2 Keyboard and USB Mouse Combo Black

productAttributes.productDescription:
Logitech MK200 is a sleek keyboard with mouse combo. The combo consists of Logitech K200 wired keyboard and wired mouse. The Logitech keyboard and mouse are wired with USB connectors. The keyboard measures 450 mm x 155 mm x 18 mm. Weighing only 490 gm, the keyboard is very light. The cable has a length of 1.8 meters for added mobility. The thin profile enhances the slim design of the MK200 keyboard.

The feather touch keys are built in to a spill resistant body. With eight additional hotkeys, the Logitech MK200 keyboard is built to deliver high performance. The hotkeys have convenient add-on functions of Play/Pause, Mute, Volume down, Volume up, Internet home,Launch default e-mail application, PC sleep, and Calculator launch. The keyboard is full sized with number pad.

The Logitech MK200 keyboard is fitted with tilt stands that open out to provide a 8 degree tilt to the keyboard, so you can experience better typing comfort. The keys of the Logitech MK200 keyboard have a stroke life of upto 5 million 50 lakhs key strokes, while the hotkeys have an equal life. The mouse in the MK200 combo is sleek and compact with Plug n Play convenience. The Optical tracking of the MK200 mouse is accurate for optimised navigation. The Logitech MK200 keyboard with mouse comes with a 3 year limited hardware warranty.
productAttributes.title: Logitech MK200 USB 2.0 Keyboard

productAttributes.productDescription:
Logitech MK260 Wireless keyboard combo is a wireless keyboard plus mouse combo. With a single receiver for both mouse and keyboard, the MK260 combo is convenient to use with Desktops and other devices like All-In-Ones, Laptops as well. The long battery life of the keyboard and mouse means less frequent battery changes.

Build

The Logitech MK260 keyboard is light and sleekly built. The thin form of the keyboard is strong and durable. The mouse is ergonomically designed for comfortable operation. With grooves for fingers, the mouse is hand-friendly. The keyboard is spill resistant. Both, keyboard and mouse come in dual colour chassis, black main body panel and coloured band running around the main panel. In addition to the main keys, the keyboard also has 8 hotkeys that include media keys, Internet launch key, email launch key and Calculator launch key. The keys are UV coated for fade-free durability.

Performance and Features

The Logitech MK260 combo runs on 2.4 GHz wireless frequency giving maximum range to users. With 128 bit encryption, the transfers between the receiver and the keyboard-mouse units is secure. The mouse provides 1000 DPI optical tracking for improved, smooth navigation.

The keyboard is powered by 2 AAA size batteries, while the mouse is powered by 1 AA size battery. The keyboard batteries the last up to 24 months, while the mouse battery lasts up to 6 months. Both keyboard and mouse are designed for auto standby mode, thus conserving power for longer lasting battery.

The best feature is the easy Plug n Play installation that works on any PC, including Windows XP, Windows Vista and Windows 7. The Logitech MK260 combo comes with a 3 year limited hardware warranty.

The keyboard comes with integrated number pad. Sleekly built, the keyboard has a life up to 10 million keystrokes. The keyboard incline can be adjusted with the turn-out stands at the bottom. The keyboard is spill resistant, making it easy to clean and maintain. The keys are quiet and responsive for effortless use.

The mouse is designed for comfortable and ambidextrous use. With two click-able buttons and a rubber scroll button, the mouse is smooth and fast. The mouse uses 1000 DPI tracking for better accuracy. productAttributes.productDescription:
The need for adventure still intrigues people to do things they would not otherwise do in their normal lives. Gaming provides relief for adventure seekers as they are able to indulge in fantasy and mayhem without actually putting themselves in any direct danger or harm. Computer gaming has grown in popularity and a new breed of gamers have emerged who earn a living competing for prize money in major tournaments that are telecasted live over the internet. Professional gamers rely heavily on hi-tech gaming gear besides their talent.

The Tt eSPORTS Challenger is a great gaming keyboard for gamers who are starting out and training hard to become better. The advanced features make this budget-friendly device an ideal gaming keyboard to learn how to bind keys, program macros and save profiles. The Tt eSPORTS Challenger Gaming Keyboard is connected to the computer by way of a gold-plated USB connector for reliable data transmission integrity. The USB cable is braided which ensures it remains tangle free and that it lasts longer.

Style and Portability

The Tt eSPORTS Challenger Gaming Keyboard has dimensions of 480 x 205.5 x 25 mm and is comfortable to use for long marathon gaming sessions. The Tt logo in the centre of the wrist rest can be lit up if required. The kick flip stands raise the rear of the keyboard to make your gameplay smoother. Another interesting and unique feature of this keyboard is the mini fan that keeps your hand cool and dry while playing for extended sessions. This innovative and durable fan is capable of 6000 rotations per minute and has a life expectancy of 50,000 hours.

The Tt eSPORTS Challenger Gaming Keyboard allows you to program macro keys which help reduce time spent searching for the right keys. You can change profiles on the keyboard itself by using the On Board Profile Switch keys which is a dual function of the function keys 9 to 12. This gaming keyboard allows you to save 3 profiles with different macros thereby tripling your macro key bindings. The 32 KB on board memory stores all 3 profile and 18 macro settings for easy access while playing.

The Tt Challenger Gaming Keyboard runs best on computers with Windows OS. The troublesome Windows Key can be replaced with a dummy Windows key so that you don’t accidentally minimize your game. The Tt eSPORTS Challenger renders the most advanced anti-ghost key matrix which allows you to use up to 20 keys at any given moment without any interference. This sturdy gaming keyboard is designed to have a lifespan of 10 million keystrokes.

Multimedia and Connectivity

The Tt eSPORTS Challenger Gaming Keyboard has 7 easy access multimedia keys that are the dual functions of the keys F1 to F7. The multimedia keys allow you to control volume and video or audio playback options. A USB port is available at the rear of the keyboard, which lets you connect devices such as MP3 players, external hard disks and pen drives. You can use this port to also connect a gaming mouse in order to reduce any strain to the mouse wire. The fan when disconnected from the keyboard can be stored in its storage are at the rear of the keyboard.

The smart cable management system found under the Tt eSPORTS Challenger Gaming Keyboard lets you route wires through it thereby reducing clutter around the keyboard and protecting the wire from any external damage. The minimum system requirements to install this keyboard are a USB port [1.1 or 2.0], Windows XP, Vista or 7, Internet connection for driver installation. All in all the Tt eSPORTS Challenger is a good gaming keyboard to start with and train till you are ready for the next level.
productAttributes.title: Tt eSPORTS Challenger USB 2.0 Keyboard Black

productAttributes.productDescription:
Professional gaming equipment has seen many changes in the last few years as gaming peripheral manufacturers and designers take technical input from professional gamers who use them for practise and in tournaments. Professional gamers are now sponsored by gaming teams like Team Liquid and Evil Genius who let the gamer concentrate on only gaming while they take care of everything else such as travel, accommodation, registration at global gaming events and sponsorship deals. Thermaltake entered the gaming equipment market by launching their electronic sports brand Tt eSPORTS in 2010 to meet the demands of the growing gaming community.

The Tt eSPORTS Meka G1 is a high-end gaming keyboard that has a simple design with no extra frills to divert and distract you from the task at hand. The Meka G1 connects to your computer by way of a military grade USB cable that is steel woven to make it incredibly tough and reliable. The USB connectors are gold-plated to enhance its durability while improving its data transmission capabilities. The USB cable has 2 USB connectors, of which one powers the keyboard and the other connects the USB hub on the keyboard to the computer.

Style and Portability

The Tt eSPORTS Meka G1 Gaming Keyboard has dimensions of 430 x 160 x 40 mm and is the right size to play fast without hitting the wrong keys. The Meka G1 Gaming Keyboard features the standard QWERTY layout with a full Number Pad located on the right side. The Meka G1 Keyboard comes with a matt finish that does not retain fingerprints. The red Tt logo is located above the Num Pad and on the palm rest.

The Tt eSPORTS Meka G1 Gaming Keyboard uses Cherry Black Mechanical Switches that are highly responsive and bounce back to provide you with tactile feedback. The Cherry Black Mechanical switches last longer than contemporary keyboards and has a life expectancy of 50 million key strokes. The Black switches features a no-click switch, which means that this keyboard is very quiet when compared to other mechanical keyboards which make a lot of noise with each keystroke.

The wrist rest of the Tt eSPORTS Meka G1 Gaming Keyboard is detachable which can be useful in cases where you don’t have much space on your desktop. The wrist rest provides the proper ergonomic angle for your wrist, so that you can play for many hours without hurting your hands.  Underneath the Meka G1 Gaming Keyboard there are 4 non-slip pads that hold the keyboard in place while playing at a furious pace. The Meka G1 keyboard also has 2 feet towards the rear bottom corners and can be used to get a higher tilt based on your comfort level.

Performance and Connectivity

The Tt eSPORTS Meka G1 Gaming Keyboard works best on computers running Windows 7, Vista, XP or Mac OS. To avoid disturbing your gameplay Tt eSPORTS have removed the left side Windows Key that pulls up the Windows Menu and minimizes your Game Window. The Windows Key is replaced with the Function Key which lets you activate the dual functions of the F keys. The Multimedia keys are paired up with Function keys to reduce the need for additional keys that will increase the size of the keyboard. Function Keys F1 to F4 have playback options and F5 to F7 let you control the volume options directly from the keyboard.

The Meka G1 Gaming Keyboard from Tt eSPORTS transfers information keyed into the keyboard 8 times faster when compared to other contemporary keyboards. The Meka G1 has a polling rate of 1000 Hz when connected to the computer through the USB port. If you use the USB to PS/2 adapter when connecting the Meka G1 keyboard you get total anti-ghosting capabilities which allow you to press as many keys as you can simultaneously with all your instructions being executed in game.

The Tt eSPORTS Meka G1 comes with 2 USB ports built into the keyboard to allow you to connect external hard disks, MP3 players, pen drives and other gaming peripherals like a gaming mouse or joystick. This Meka G1 keyboard also allows you to connect your microphone and headphones directly to the keyboard as it has 3 mm audio jacks for both. The minimum system requirements to install this Meka G1 gaming keyboard are a computer with 2 available USB ports, Windows or Mac OS and an internet connection to download and install the latest driver.
productAttributes.title: Tt eSPORTS Meka USB 2.0 Keyboard Black

productAttributes.productDescription:
Gaming gear is essential for every gamer eager to climb to the top in the cutthroat world professional gaming. Professional gaming requires gamers to practise and be skilled at executing complex attack strategies that decimate their opponents. In addition to skill, hi-end gaming gear can make a huge difference in your gameplay speed and accuracy. Thermaltake has been a major player in the personal computer power and cooling industry for many years having produced exciting products like the Striking Level 10 cabinet.

Thermaltake’s gaming division Tt eSPORTS concentrates on only making innovative gaming gear that is targeted at gamers who want to take their gaming skills to the next level. The Tt eSPORTS Challenger Ultimate Gaming Keyboard is an advanced gaming device that connects to your computer by way of a detachable USB 2.0 cable. The 2 m USB cable has a gold-plated connector that enhances the durability and conductivity.

Style and Portability

The Tt eSPORTS Challenger Ultimate Gaming Keyboard has dimensions of 505 x 195 x 27 mm, which is large enough to provide ample space for easy hand movement during intense gameplay. The Challenger Ultimate Keyboard comes with a Wizard 256 colour backlight design. You can tweak the backlight on this keyboard to any colour to help set the mood for an intense gaming session. The intensity of the backlight can also be adjusted to suit your eyesight without being overly bright or dim. The Tt logo has the standard Tt eSPORTS Dragon-Red backlighting which can be turned off or on.

The Tt eSPORTS Challenger Ultimate is a durable gaming keyboard that has a 10 Million keystroke lifespan. Tt eSPORTS also take care of their gamers as they have provided a hand cooling fan that can be fit on this gaming keyboard. This fan becomes useful when you are playing long marathon sessions and your sweaty hands make it difficult to play efficiently.  The fan has a life expectancy of 50,000 hours.

Performance

Tt eSPORTS has provided gamers with 10 additional programmable keys on the Tt eSPORTS Challenger Ultimate Gaming Keyboard. These 10 T keys are designed to be easy to reach and are located on either side of the keyboard. The Tt user interface software is required to program the 14 macro keys, switch the backlight of the Tt logo on or off and set the 4 levels of backlighting on the keyboard. The Tt software is also required to save profiles with different macro key bindings to the graphical user interface GUI, the computer or the 64 KB on-board memory of the Tt eSPORTS Challenger Ultimate Gaming Keyboard.

The Tt eSPORTS Challenger Ultimate Gaming Keyboard works best with Windows XP, Vista, 7 and Mac OS. The pesky Windows Key can be removed and replaced with a Dummy Windows Key that seals the gap left behind. There are 8 additional removable keycaps that are meant to replace the direction and WASD cluster. Once interchanged, these permanent gaming keys will be easy to locate as they have a different colour from the other keys.

With the Tt eSPORTS Challenger Ultimate you can control the volume and playback options of music and videos by using the 6 Easy Access Multimedia Keys that is conveniently located on top right side of the keyboard. The Smart Cable Management system protects the cables on the desktop while also clearing the clutter around the keyboard so you have lots of space to move your mouse.

Multimedia and Connectivity

The Tt eSPORTS Challenger Ultimate has 2 USB ports built into the keyboard which can be used to connect pen drives, MP3 players and other gaming peripherals. You can connect your headphones and microphone directly to the audio ports of this Tt gaming keyboard which saves you the hassles of reaching behind your system. The minimum requirements to install this keyboard are a computer with USB ports, Windows or Mac OS, internet connection for driver installation and registration for future software upgrades. A carry bag is also included in case you want to carry the Tt eSPORTS Challenger Ultimate Gaming Keyboard to your friends place or tournaments.
productAttributes.title: Tt eSPORTS Challenger USB 2.0 Keyboard Black

productAttributes.productDescription:
Just as single player games are making way for multiplayer or social games, gaming gear is also undergoing a change with manufacturers investing time and money to understand what a top gamer requires to get to the next level. Having ergonomic and precision equipment makes all the difference in game sessions that may last up to 3 hours or more. Gaming keyboards are specially designed to ensure that the information entered is quickly actuated in game and to provide consistent gaming performance without lag.

The Tt eSPORTS Meka G Unit is a high-end mechanical gaming keyboard that will change the way you game with its responsive keys and specialized keys for macro key bindings. The Meka G Unit connects to your computer by way of a braided USB cable that ends in 2 gold-plated USB connectors. This USB cable has a length of 2 m which lets you place the keyboard at a comfortable distance from the viewing screen. The USB cable is also detachable which is useful when you are traveling with the Meka G Unit to your friends place or for a tournament. One USB connector powers the Keyboard while the other is dedicated to the USB hub on the Meka G Unit.

Style and Portability

The Tt eSPORTS Meka G Unit Gaming Keyboard has dimensions of 430 x 160 x 40 mm and has a quality build that is durable. The Meka G Unit has selective backlighting which means only the most commonly used gaming keys are lit to help identify it faster while playing games. The backlight feature is concentrated in 4 areas which are the WASD cluster with the Shift and Control Key, Space bar, Directional Keys and the Direction Keys on the Num Pad. The intensity of the backlight can be set to 3 levels of brightness or it can be set to pulse mode.

The Meka G Unit Gaming Keyboard has excellent elastic capabilities for gaming due to the use of Cherry Black Mechanical Switches which increases the lifespan of the keyboard by 50 million keystrokes. The ergonomic design of this gaming keyboard is enhanced by the use of a detachable wrist rest which allows you to rest your arms while playing marathon gaming sessions or practising. The Smart Cable Management helps you reduce the wire clutter on your desktop by routing the wires under your keyboard.

Performance

The Meka G Unit Gaming Keyboard comes with 12 additional game specific keys on the left side and you can program these keys to perform any function you like, be it for gaming or for work. Each profile setting on this Meka G Unit can hold up to 20 macro key binding which works out to a total of 60 macros as there are 3 profiles. The Tt eSPORTS Meka G Unit Gaming Keyboard also uses ISS or instant switch system which is an advance macro key switching function that lets the gamer use all 60 macro keys under 1 profile. This gaming keyboard works best on computers with Windows 7, Vista, XP or Mac OS.

The Tt eSPORTS Meka G Unit Gaming Keyboard is able to disable the pesky Windows Key by activating the Game Mode Key which is located above the special T keys. The advanced Anti-ghosting function of the Meka G Unit lets you simultaneously press up to 46 keys anywhere on the keyboard without losing any data in the transmission. Music and video can be easily controlled directly from the keyboard by using the 7 Easy Access Multimedia Keys that are located on the right side above the Num Pad. The 1000 Hz polling rate of the Meka G Unit make it 8 times faster than most contemporary keyboards. The 64 KB on-board memory retains information about macro and profile settings that can be revived even if the keyboard is connected to a different computer.

Multimedia and Connectivity

The Meka G Unit from Tt eSPORTS makes your life easier as it comes with a built in USB hub that has 2 ports. The USB hub is located right next to the Microphone-in and Audio-out 3mm ports. These ports eliminate the need for you to go behind your computer to connect USB devices and audio connectors. The minimum system requirements are a computer with 2 USB ports, Windows or Mac OS and an internet connection to download and install the drivers and software updates.
productAttributes.title: Tt eSPORTS Meka Keyboard Black

productAttributes.productDescription:
Would you take a knife to a gun fight? It’s the same in the gaming world, where elite players use state-of-the-art equipment that delivers high performance while amateurs use normal keyboards meant for regular work. Gaming keyboards are designed to react to every order given by your fingers at breakneck speed in order to execute complex manoeuvres that help you gain the advantage over your opponent. The newer games being launched comes with online multiplayer game play with regional or world ranking and massive bragging rights.

The Tt eSPORTS Challenger Pro Gaming Keyboard is a cutting-edge gaming accessory that will help you advance your gaming skills to the next level. This wired keyboard allows you to make changes and adjustments that quite simply help you react faster to unexpected tactics that your adversary may employ. This keyboard wire fits into a USB port and can work at full USB 2.0 speeds.

Style and Portability

The Tt eSPORTS Challenger Pro Gaming Keyboard is spacious and has dimensions of 505 x 195 x 27 mm. The red back light of this gaming keyboard gives it futuristic glow that feels like it’s taken out of a video game. The back light has a light switch with 4 settings, which allows you to set the brightness at 25, 75 or 100 per cent brightness. The fourth setting is the back light off option. The Tt eSPORTS Challenger Pro Gaming Keyboard comes with a medium sized wrist rest that helps in using the keyboard comfortably.

The keys are ergonomically designed to offer comfortable and prolonged use without straining your hands too much. The T keys are extra keys that were added to make your gaming experience easier as they are conveniently located on both sides of the keyboard which makes it easy to access quickly.

Performance

The Tt eSPORTS Challenger Pro allows you to program macro settings on your gaming keyboard which again improves your performance as you are now able to perform a combination of moves in a single motion. This feature requires you to install the keyboard driver data from the CD provided before you can use it. This gaming keyboard from Tt eSPORTS works well with Windows Xp, Vista, 7 and Mac OS.

While playing games the windows key is probably the most hated as if you press it accidentally, it minimizes your game and pulls the desktop onto your screen. Tt eSPORTS gives you a dummy windows keycap which you can use to replace the existing windows key. This dummy windows key prevents the original function from working. You can save up to 4 profiles with different macro settings on this gaming keyboard and you can even switch in between a game depending on your style of game play.

The Tt eSPORTS Challenger Pro Gaming Keyboard comes with an on-board memory of 64 KB which stores the profile and macro settings. The 4 profile settings are indicated by different colour LED indicator. This keyboard also comes with 8 additional red coloured keys that you can use to replace the WASD keys as well as the direction keys. This feature allows you to detect these important keys faster, which again reduces your reaction time.

This gaming keyboard from Tt eSPORTS also has 6 multimedia keys that are easily accessible. The volume can be controlled by using the volume up and volume down keys while the other 4 keys make up the playback options.

Multimedia and Connectivity

The Tt eSPORTS Challenger Pro Gaming Keyboard has a 2 metre cable which allows you to comfortably place the keyboard at a comfortable distance from the monitor. To ensure your hands are kept cool and sweat free during intense game play, Tt eSPORTS has included a novel fan that fits into a special jack in the keyboard. This fan can be placed to face any direction and has a speed of 6000 RPM. When the fan is no longer required it can be removed and stored in its special storage compartment at the back of the keyboard.

The Tt eSPORTS Challenger Pro Gaming Keyboard comes with 2 USB ports that can support devices that consume less than 100 mA of power. The smart cable management system secures the cable and when you need to carry it around you can detach the wire from the keyboard to avoid damage. So go ahead and add this impressive gaming keyboard to your arsenal and blow your opposition to smithereens.

productAttributes.productDescription:
Technology has indeed made the world smaller as people are now able to get information or data wherever they go on wireless devices. When the world is entering into the wireless age why should you still be using wired keyboards and mice that restrict you to your desk. Wireless computer peripherals allow you to stretch your legs a bit more and give you the freedom of unrestricted movement. Even activities like watching a movie becomes easier with a wireless keyboard as you can use them to control the media being played on the computer while relaxing on the couch.

The Logitech Combo MK220 Wireless Keyboard and Mouse is the perfect companion for work or play as it gives you total control of your computer from anywhere in the room. Once the USB receiver is plugged in, the keyboard and mouse combo will start working. You can start working on your blog, or start posting updates on Facebook without installing any special software. The advanced 2.4 GHz Wireless connection eliminates delays and dropouts to provide superior uninterrupted connectivity. You can use the keyboard and mouse in a radius of 10 m from the USB receiver.

Style and Portability

The Logitech Combo MK220 Wireless Keyboard is compact and designed to take less space on your desktop. The smaller size does not come at the expense of comfort as all the keys that are present on a regular keyboard are available. You can easily switch from your normal keyboard to this wireless gadget without having to struggle with a steep learning curve. The minimalist design helps you type faster as the space between the keys are reduced, which in turn reduces the distance your fingers have to travel while typing.

The Logitech Combo MK220 Wireless Keyboard blends well with your office or home décor while giving you the freedom to place it anywhere. The MK220 Wireless Keyboard has whisper-quiet keys that barely make a sound even when typing very fast. This feature allows you to concentrate on your work without disturbing others around you. If you need to connect the Logitech Combo MK220 Wireless Keyboard and Mouse to another computer all you have to do is disconnect the receiver and plug it into the new computer. The Plug and Play feature of the Logitech Wireless Keyboard and Mouse connects to the operating system immediately and you can start working or playing right away.

Performance and Connectivity

Data that is being entered through the Logitech Combo MK220 Wireless Keyboard and Mouse is protected by a 128-bit AES encryption system which means your confidential emails and notes will not be leaked. The 128-bit AES encryption is one of the highest levels of data protection available and using this, the Logitech keyboard and mouse combo ensures only the intended machine receives the information. The Logitech Combo MK220 Wireless Keyboard and Mouse works best on computers that run on Windows XP, Vista or 7.

The Wireless Logitech Keyboard is powered by 2 AAA batteries and if used properly the battery charge should last at least 24 months. The wireless mouse uses 2 AA batteries which are estimated to last up to 5 months under normal circumstances. The advanced 2.4 GHz wireless is designed to consume less power thereby prolonging the life of the batteries. The minimum system requirements to install the Logitech Combo MK220 Wireless Keyboard and Mouse are a computer with an available USB port for the receiver and Windows OS.

productAttributes.productDescription:
Though wireless technology has been available for the last few years, it has been out of reach for the common man due to the high costs involved. Zebronics is one of India’s leading computer peripherals manufacturers with over 15 years of experience in making durable and cost effective products that suit the Indian environment. Zebronics has introduced their range of various products like cabinets, speakers, TV tuner cards, UPS and networking products that make working or playing on computers more enjoyable.

The Zebronics Companion-II Wireless Keyboard and Mouse combo is designed to reduce the wire clutter on your desktop to give a clean and professional appearance. The Companion-II Wireless Keyboard and Mouse combo connects to your computer by way of a small USB receiver that plugs into any available USB port. This receiver works on a 2.4 GHz digital wireless communication system that ensures the keyboard and mouse work uninterrupted. This Zebronics plug and play device does not require you to install any software or drivers before you start using it.

Style and Portability

The Zebronics Companion-II Wireless Keyboard and Mouse combo is built to provide long-lasting service and good performance. The wireless keyboard has dimensions of 453 x 180 x 25 mm while the wireless mouse has dimensions of 95 x 64 x 35 mm and the USB receiver has dimensions of 19 x 14.5 x 6.2 mm. Without batteries the whole package weighs 615 g which is divided among the keyboard, mouse and USB receiver as 560 g, 54 g and 1 g respectively. The compact and ultra-slim Companion II Keyboard provides a natural angle to allow your hands to rest comfortably while you work.

The elegant and fashionable design of this Zebronics Keyboard complements the ergonomically designed mouse with its dotted sides to ensure superior grip. The scroll wheel on the mouse allows you to scroll up and down documents or webpages easily. The durable mouse has a lifespan of 10 million clicks while the keyboard can handle 10 million strokes throughout its lifespan. The total number of keys including the special hot keys is 117 and they are easy to use without making errors as there is ample space between them. There are 2 feet located at the back of the keyboard to increase the height, if the natural angle needs to be adjusted for more comfort.

Performance and Connectivity

The Zebronics Companion-II Wireless Keyboard and Mouse combo allows you to relax and work in a 9 m radius around the USB receiver that is plugged into your computer. The USB receiver uses 5 V DC to work and allows you to save a USB port as both the Mouse and Keyboard connect to the same receiver. The Companion-II Wireless Mouse has an optical sensor with 800 DPI which is excellent for use at work or home. The keyboard comes with 13 additional buttons, located on top, to help you activate certain internet and multimedia applications quickly. 

There are hot keys like the forward, backward, favourites, Mail and home page button to help you navigate quickly on webpages. The other hot keys allow you to control the playback options of videos or music. You can quickly pause, play, stop, mute and increase or decrease volume at the touch of a button. Amazingly the keyboard needs only 1 AAA battery to run while the mouse needs 2 AAA batteries. The smart power indicating lamps on both the Companion-II Mouse and Keyboard lets you know how much battery charge is left and when it is time to replace the exhausted batteries with fresh ones. The keyboard also comes with an on/off switch which allows you to turn it off when not in use, in order to conserve battery power.

productAttributes.productDescription:
Wireless technology is now being integrated into every type of electronic device or gadget to make it more user-friendly and accessible. Going wireless brings in many benefits that make the investment well worth as it removes restrictions and frees you to relax a bit more. Wireless peripherals for computers remove the clutter of wires around the system and let you work or play from the couch while your computer rests on the table. Genius has introduced wireless peripherals for computers that are reliable and innovative in design.

The Genius SlimStar 8000 is a good wireless keyboard and mouse combination for use either at work or home. The reliable 2.4 GHz transmission system with the Anti-Interference Receiver ensures uninterrupted connectivity and seamless performance. The 2.4 GHz receiver also provides you with a longer operational distance that allows you to sit back and relax while typing emails or notes. The receiver needs to be plugged into an available USB port to start functioning.

Style and Functionality

The Genius SlimStar 8000 keyboard is rectangular with dimensions of 450 x 120 x 19.8 mm. The keyboard and mouse combo weighs 450 g in total which makes it light enough to carry to work. The keyboard is designed to be water resistant with holes underneath that allow the liquid to drain out. This feature is good for people who like to drink coffee or tea at their desk while working. The Genius SlimStar 8000 keyboard has an ultra slim build that feels sturdy. The keys have ultra slim key caps that lets your fingers glide over them without any hindrance while helping you type more comfortably without any strain.

The innovative key caps provide great tactile feedback which lets you feel the key you have actuated. The alphabets, numbers and symbols are imposed on the key by using the Laser Printing Technology which makes the print last for a long time even after heavy usage. The keyboard’s height can be adjusted by raising the two feet located under the keyboard to provide a more natural angle for your wrist. Good typing posture eliminates future injuries to your hands from excessive typing or gaming.

Performance and Battery

The 2.4 GHz wireless receiver picks up signals from the Genius SlimStar 8000 keyboard and mouse in a radius of 10 m. This feature allows you to use the computer while relaxing on your couch from across the room or show off your wireless control while giving a presentation in the meeting room. The Genius SlimStar 8000 keyboard and mouse combo works best with computers that have Windows 7, Windows Vista or Windows XP installed on them. There are 2 hot keys to increase and decrease the volume quickly without having to use the mouse to control the volume on the operating system.

The Genius SlimStar 8000 Mouse is designed to be fast and accurate with an optical resolution of 1200 DPI. The optical mouse sensor is perfect for use at work and for some light online gaming when you are on a break. The SlimStar 8000 Mouse provides a comfortable feel while enabling smooth movement control with its 3 easy to use buttons which includes the magic roller for vertical movement through documents. The mouse has an on/off switch that lets you turn off the mouse when not in use to conserve battery charge. The keyboard requires 1 AAA battery to perform while the mouse requires 2 AAA batteries. The minimum system requirements to install this keyboard mouse combo are a computer with an available USB port and preinstalled Windows OS.

productAttributes.productDescription:
Wireless technology is being integrated into most of the devices and gadgets we use today, making them simpler and more effective to use. Imagine a life without mobile phone and Wi-Fi where everything is connected by wires which add to the clutter. Wireless technology frees you to pursue your dreams without being tied down and helps keep you in touch with your loved ones and friends on the move. Going wireless at work frees you from sitting at your desk all the time while improving your overall productivity and quality of work life. Genius has introduced a range of high quality wireless computer peripherals to help you get unrestricted access to your computer while you relax on the couch across the room.

The Genius SlimStar I815 is a wireless keyboard and mouse combo that will change the way you work. The SlimStar I815 connects to your computer by way of a mini dongle receiver that has to be plugged into an available USB 2.0 port. The anti-interference function of the 2.4 GHz wireless technology provides uninterrupted connectivity and longer operational distance. The Genius SlimStar I815 is a handy wireless keyboard and mouse combination that can be connected to any type of computer be it a laptop, notebook or a desktop computer.

Style, Performance and Battery

The Genius SlimStar I815 is a rectangular keyboard with dimensions of 436 x 145 x 20 mm and weighs just 500 g. Due to its light weight it is comfortable to carry the I815 combo to work every day along with your laptop. The ultra slim design of the keyboard makes it comfortable to store in your laptop bag after use at work. The stylish keycaps of the I815 keyboard provides great tactile feedback and is silent when typing. This feature helps you type without errors as you can feel each key being actuated when typing fast.

The Genius SlimStar I815 also comes with a high resolution optical mouse that provides accurate and swift movement of the cursor across the screen. The mouse has 3 buttons which includes the scroll wheel that helps move vertically on webpages or documents. The optical mouse has an optical resolution of 1200 DPI that is perfect for work, designing or online gaming. The Genius SlimStar I815 works best on computers that run on Windows 7, Windows Vista or Windows XP.

The SlimStar I815 also provides quick access keys for launching commonly used internet applications like your email account or your favourite webpages. There are quick action keys to help you control your multimedia files like play/pause, stop, previous and next file. These quick access keys have been paired with the Function keys and can be activated by pressing the Fn key located on the bottom right side next to the Alt key. There are 3 independent hot keys located above the Num Pad to help you mute, increase or decrease the volume of the file you are playing.

The Genius SlimStar I815 uses 2 AAA batteries for the keyboard and 1 AA battery for the mouse. When running such devices it is advisable to use rechargeable batteries depending on your usage. Gamers who constantly keep pressing keys drain the batteries much faster than people who use it for office work alone. The minimum system requirements needed to install this wireless keyboard and mouse are a computer with a USB 2.0 port and Windows operating system.
