productAttributes.productDescription:
Wireless technology gives you the freedom to choose where and how you work. You are now able to access your emails and reply to them while on the move. Wireless technology can free you from being stuck at your desk the whole day. With wireless peripherals you get more room to stretch your legs and it can make you more productive as you are more relaxed. Genius has introduced a range of wireless computer peripherals to make working on computers more fun and fruitful.

The Genius SlimStar i820 is a combination of a wireless keyboard and mouse that is designed to bring simplicity, style and elegance to your digital lifestyle. The SlimStar i820 makes use of a Frequency Stationary System with an anti-interference function to deliver uninterrupted connection to your computer. The reliable 2.4 GHz transmission and longer operational distance make this keyboard and mouse combination perfect for work, especially for showing presentations at meeting. The Genius SlimStar i820 will work on most types of computers be it desktops, laptops or All-In-One PCs. For the computer to register information coming from the SlimStar i820, you have to connect the mini-sized Pico receiver to an available USB port on the computer.

Style and Performance

The Genius SlimStar i820 is a full size keyboard that has dimensions of 458 x 142 x 26 mm and weighs a mere 730 g which makes it easy to carry around. The i820 Keyboard has a stylish piano-black finish that gives it an elegant and polished look. The slim shape of the keyboard helps in reducing the overall weight in order to make the keyboard easily portable. The stylish keycaps are easy to type on and are very responsive with swift on screen actuation. The Apple style keycaps of the SlimStar i820 Keyboard provides you with crisp feedback while typing which lets you know that the key has been actuated. This feature not only improves your typing speed but also ensures a strain-free hand positioning with extra space between each key.

The SlimStar i820 High Resolution Mouse has 4 buttons which includes the scroll wheel that lets you vertically scroll up and down quickly. The scroll wheel comes with a turbo feature that provides hyper navigation through documents or webpages. The ergonomic design of the mouse allows it to fit comfortably in the palm of your hand. The i820 keyboard comes with 18 hot keys that provide a single button access to your favourite and most used applications or functions. The Hot keys have been paired with the Function keys and can be activated by pressing the Fn button which is before the right control button.

There are 8 multimedia buttons that lets you mute, Increase or decrease the volume, play/pause a file, play previous or next track and stop playing a file. The other hot keys are dedicated keys to launch applications like the calculator, My Computer, favourites and email. The Genius SlimStar i820 works best with computers that have Windows 7, Windows Vista, Windows XP or Windows 2000 as their operating system.

Connectivity and Battery

The Genius SlimStar i820 requires a total of 4 AAA batteries for this keyboard and mouse combination. The 2 AAA batteries for the keyboard have to be inserted into the battery socket under the keyboard, while the 2 AAA batteries for the mouse fit in the battery socket located under the top cover. The on/off switch under the mouse lets you turn it off when it is not in use in order to conserve battery charge. The minimum system requirements to install this keyboard and mouse combo are a computer with an available USB port, and preinstalled Windows OS. So go ahead enjoy a wireless experience that will change the way you work for the better.

productAttributes.productDescription:
Wireless technology has become an integral part of most new age electronic devices like the mobile phone and portable computers. Different types of wireless technology have improved the way we interact and communicate with our loved ones and friends. Upgrading your existing computer at work or home with wireless peripherals makes it easier on you, as now you don’t have to deal with tangled wires that clutter your desktop. Belkin has introduced a range of wireless computer peripherals with the best in technology such as the laser powered mouse to achieve the perfect results you expect and deserve.

The Belkin Ultimate Wireless Combo with Laser Mouse C800 is designed to be compact and very user-friendly. The Belkin Ultimate Wireless C800 connects to your computer by way of a 2.4 GHz Nano receiver that connects to an available USB port. The Plug-and-play feature of the C800 Nano receiver makes it easy to connect to any type of computer be it a desktop or portable computer quickly. Both the Belkin C800 Keyboard and Mouse connect to the same USB Nano receiver which not only makes it convenient but also keeps a USB port free for connecting other computer peripherals like external hard disks, pen drives, MP3 players and gaming equipment. 

Style, Performance and Battery

The Belkin Ultimate Wireless Combo with Laser Mouse C800 has a thin design that allows your hands to rest in a more natural and comfortable position which in turn reduces the strain on your wrists even if you are working or playing for an extended period of time. The low profile keys are designed to be highly responsive when typing while remaining quiet. These keys allow you to type faster as your fingers can easily glide from one key to the other without much hindrance due to the low profile. The keys on the Belkin C800 keyboard are considered to be very durable as it can withstand up to 3 million key strokes.

The Belkin C800 Ultimate Wireless Laser Mouse comes with 3 buttons which includes the scroll wheel that will help you swiftly navigate vertically through webpages and documents. The C800 Laser Mouse has a DPI of 1600 which results in very fast movement tracking and is particularly useful in high-end games or design work. The ergonomic design of the mouse makes it fit comfortably in the palm of your hand while providing long lasting comfort. The mouse also has an ambidextrous design that makes it suitable for both left and right handed users. The Belkin C800 Ultimate Wireless Keyboard and Mouse Combo works best with computers that run on Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7 or Mac OS X v 10 and later.

The Belkin C800 Keyboard makes working on the internet and using multimedia content very easy as there are dedicated hot keys to help you access and control them, located on the top end of the keyboard. You can easily mute and increase or decrease the volume directly from the keyboard without having to use the mouse to do the same on the screen. The first 5 hot keys help you access your music, play/pause, stop, play previous file and play next file. The Belkin C800 keyboard requires 2 AAA batteries to function while the laser mouse also needs 2 AAA batteries. The minimum system requirements needed to install this Belkin Keyboard and Mouse Combo is an available USB port and pre-installed Windows or Mac OS.

Witness the true power of Cyborg and take your gaming to the next level with the Cyborg Keyboard range. When performance is key, customization is vital, and losing is not an option, only Cyborg brings the power you crave.

  • Built for 21st century gaming, the V.7 embodies the true essence of the Cyborg range.
  • Multi-color Backlighting - Tru-Vu illuminations allow you to set the mood and illuminate your world, mixing shades from Red through Amber to Green.
  • Touch-sensitive, backlit dashboard Control Panel - Configure your lighting, media and volume controls with the brush of a finger.
  • WASD, cursor, Cyborg and NumPad keys can be lit independently from the rest of the keyboard to highlight commonly used gaming keys - Set each area to your preferred color or brightness to make the keyboard battle ready.
  • Cyborg Mode - Instantly disable the Windows keys and change the color and brightness of your gaming keys at the touch of a button.
  • Set and forget - Persistent key illumination settings ensure your color combinations remain intact, even after a system reboot.
  • 12 programmable Cyborg keys - Store your favorite macros for buying equipment, activating abilities or just for initiating your favorite trash talk.
  • Powerful ST Programming Software - Create profiles for each game that you play in order to save different button configurations.
  • Hard wearing, metal-plated key caps in key gaming areas are designed to withstand the punishment that pro gamers demand.
  • Pass-through USB, audio and microphone sockets means no more crawling behind your PC to change your USB device or audio configuration.
  • Enhanced multiple key presses in gaming areas for complex in-game commands.
  • Adjustable wrist rest and keyboard rake angle front and back.

productAttributes.productDescription:
Logitech is a leading manufacturer of professional computer gaming equipment and the innovative features they incorporate in their products have won them a lot of gaming fans. The Logitech Gaming Combo G100 Keyboard and mouse is a good combination of gaming peripherals for an amateur gamer who is just starting out or has a low budget. The mouse is quick-moving and quiet while the keyboard is very responsive which allows you to get total control of the game.

The Logitech Gaming Combo G100 Keyboard is designed to increase the speed at which you play games by enabling you to perform more actions easily and by responding quickly to instructions provided by you. This Logitech keyboard and mouse is a plug and play device that starts working as soon as you connect it to the USB or PS/2 port on your computer.

Style and Portability

The Logitech Gaming Combo G100 Keyboard is built to last long and perform well even after long gaming sessions. The mouse buttons have been rated up to 3 million clicks and the mouse feet has been tested to 250 km which is very good for this low budget combo. The most commonly used gaming keys which are the WASD keys and the direction keys are highlighted to make it easier to identify during intense gameplay. The keys of the Logitech Gaming Combo G100 Keyboard have a normal keyboard setup to which non gamers and amateur gamers are used to.

The mouse in this combo pack has slick polytetrafluorothlene feet which practically eliminates friction between the mouse and the table thereby allowing smoother motion with less lag. The 2500 dpi optical sensor awakens the sniper in you with precision targeting and deadly accuracy. A button behind the scroll wheel lets you change the dpi levels from a minimum of 1000 to a maximum of 2500. Depending on your requirement you can shift from pixel-precise targeting to lightning fast manoeuvres by just pressing the dpi button even while you are playing.

The Logitech Gaming Combo G100 mouse has an ambidextrous design and can be used with both the right and left hand comfortably. The mouse is ergonomically designed to let you play for longer without hurting your hands even after long marathon sessions. The G100 mouse is a lightweight device that provides effortless movement but is solid enough to allow good control. The minimum system requirements to install the Logitech Gaming Combo G100 Keyboard and Mouse are Windows OS, 2 USB ports and an internet connection to download the optional software.

productAttributes.productDescription:
Computers have moved into every aspect of human life and the way we interact with computer has changed drastically. Computers are now the centre of the entertainment hub as the concept of Home Theatre Computers has grown in popularity. When using your computer on a television it is advisable to sit at a fair distance to avoid straining your eyes. In such cases having computer peripherals with wires is simply cumbersome and a safety hazard. Wireless keyboards that combine the function of a mouse help reduce clutter and make it easy to use the Home Theatre Computer from your couch.

The Logitech K400 Wireless Keyboard is a simple device that connects to your computer quickly and easily. The Plug and Play Simplicity feature is achieved by connecting the tiny wireless receiver into an available USB port on your computer. Without even installing the software, the K400 keyboard will start working and you can even start using the hot keys. The Logitech K400 Wireless Keyboard will also work with the Logitech Unifying Receiver that is powerful enough to wirelessly connect up to 6 computer peripherals. The K400 Keyboard has a radius of 10 m or 33 feet in which you can comfortably work or play. This feature allows you to relax on your couch or bed while using your laptop, desktop computer or Home Theatre Entertainment Computer.

Style and Portability

The Logitech K400 Wireless Keyboard has a simple rectangular design with a lightweight build that makes this keyboard easy to use. The sleek and compact design of the K400 Wireless Keyboard saves space without compromising on comfort and visual appeal. The ergonomic layout of the K400 Keyboard is achieved by using clean lines with a touch of colourful patterns. The K400 Keyboard has easy-to-read keys which allow you to navigate and type quickly without making errors. The keys are easy to type on due to their sleek and low-profile design which feels good while barely making a sound. Storing the K400 Keyboard when not in use does not take up much space as you can make it stand vertically. The Num Pad has been eliminated to reduce the size of the K400 Keyboard. 

Performance and Battery

The Logitech K400 Wireless Keyboard has a built-in 3.5 inch touchpad that is located on the extreme right side. The touchpad features the novel Multi-touch Navigation system which lets you point and scroll through files and websites rapidly. The large touchpad makes scrolling vertically intuitive while other gestures also make working on the K400 easy. The Logitech K400 Wireless Keyboard works best with computers that run on Windows XP or higher. The on/off switch helps you save battery life by allowing you to switch it off when it is not in use.

The K400 Wireless Keyboard from Logitech lets you control the volume of any music or videos that you play directly from your keyboard with specialised Media Hot Keys. Separate keys for mute, volume up and down make it easy to use these functions even while lying down. The Logitech K400 Wireless Keyboard uses a 128-bit AES encryption system to ensure that the information you type on your keyboard is received only by the appropriate receiver. The 128-bit AES encryption is one of the highest levels of data encryption available to protect the information you enter on the keyboard. The K400 is powered by 2 AAA batteries and they can last up to 12 months under ideal circumstances. The minimum system requirements for installing this Logitech Keyboard are a computer with a USB port and Windows OS.

productAttributes.productDescription:
Keyboards are an all important component set for computers everywhere. No matter the size of the machine, there has to be at least the most basic input device present in order to provide it with instructions on how to work and carry out assigned tasks. Keyboards are generally a set of consolidated keys that are pre arranged in a particular format along a set in order to function as an effective input apparatus. Most keyboards are wired which make them very reliable and quick with no noticeable lag at all. However, there are wireless keyboards available that work on various technologies ranging from the older generation infra red to the latest Bluetooth and wireless radio technology.

Wireless portable keyboards are generally available with an effective range of operation that is within 5 or 10 meters depending on the kind of technology that it is based on. The Lenovo N5901 Wireless Keyboard is a mini-keyboard with a full QWERTY setup. The keyboard is ideal for home theatre systems, PCs, multimedia PCs and office systems. The Lenovo N5901 Wireless Keyboard comes with its own trackball that works like a simple mouse. This allows you to easily control all sorts of multimedia programs on the computer much like a regular mouse. With the help of the Lenovo N5901 Wireless Keyboard, you can watch on-line and offline videos, review images and also, if skilled with the trackball, you may even edit images with a certain degree of control. Editing and preparing important documents will be easy with the Wireless Keyboard. The directional keys and trackball will also make presentations easy to do in a classroom or a corporate setting.

The Lenovo N5901 Wireless Keyboard can be held in the palm without the need to place it on any surface. This makes the design highly portable. The keyboard also comes with multimedia controls like Volume Controls, Audio Mute key, Playback Controls and other similar keys for various multimedia functions. The in-hand design makes it easy to manipulate the keys and the trackball with just the use of your thumbs, even though other fingers can be comfortably used in various positions. The The Lenovo N5901 Wireless Keyboard has a 10 meter range via the USB receiver that will be connected to your system. It works on radio technology using 2.4 GHz frequency. The keyboard is small, lightweight and easy to use. It is easy to set up and is powered by AAA batteries. It is also compatible with Windows XP and above.

productAttributes.productDescription:
Gaming is a serious undertaking that results in pire fun and entertainment. This factor is multiplied when the right equipment is used for the task and that right equipment comes in the form of the Razer series of gaming accessories for Laptops and PCs. The requirement for a gaming specific keyboard is of prime importance, especially in a time when professional gaming is on the rise. If you do not have standard gaming equipment then you will be left behind in professional gaming.

The Razer Black Widow 2013 Keyboard is the perfect gaming accessory that a quintessential gamer can have, with it being one of the more affordable and exclusive gaming keyboards. The cable is designed to be tangle-free thanks to its braided fibre covered wires. The braids prevent the cable from gripping each other in the event of a tangle and can easily come undone with very little effort. The keyboard also has USB Passthrough for easy access and also comes with 1000 Hz Ultrapolling. The Razer keyboard also has 10 Keys rollover anti-ghosting. This means that up to ten digits of your hands can simultaneously press down on the keyboard and each key will get registered accurately when mapped to certain game functions.

The Razer Black Widow 2013 Keyboard also comes with 5 dedicated Macro keys for various kinds of peripheral operations. The Black Widow 2013 is supported by Windows 8, Windows 7, Windows Vista, Windows XP 32-bit, Mac OSX Ver 10.6 - 10.7 and Above thus giving it a wide range of products compatible with it. This also allows you as the gamer to carefully choose the right system and configuration based on your gaming style.

The Razer Synapse 2.0 is a revolutionary technology that has been incorporated into the Black Widow that helps the keyboard function at optimal levels during heavy gaming needs. the Synapse 2.0 by Razer basically functions like the brain of the keyboard. the keyboard is light enough with a weight of about 1500 g. The PC compatible Razer Black Widow 2013 Keyboard is 475 mm long, 171 mm wide and 20 mm in thickness or height. The dimensions of the Razer Black Widow 2013 Keyboard makes it ideal for optimal gaming performance with comfortable grip and placement of the hands and wrist.

productAttributes.productDescription:
Dragon Age II is the second instalment of the hugely popular Dragon Age franchise developed by Bioware and published by Electronic Arts. This fantasy role-playing video game lets you assume the role of Hawke a lowly refugee who becomes a legendary champion over the course of a decade. The decisions you make shape the world around you and will change the world for ever. The new cinematic, updated graphics and visual style made this sequel as popular as the first part.

The collector's edition Razer Dragon Age II BlackWidow Ultimate lets you play faster as the mechanical keys deliver crisp, tactile feedback with every actuation. The Razer Dragon Age II BlackWidow Ultimate has a composite USB cable that has 2 gold-plated USB ports and plugs for a microphone and headphones. The USB cable is braided which improves the overall strength and durability of the cable.

Style and Portability

 The Dragon Age II BlackWidow Ultimate from Razer has dimensions of 475 x 171 x 30 mm and weighs a substantial 1.5 kg. With this keyboard playing in low light or dark conditions is easy due to its blood-red backlight feature which lights up every key individually. The backlight has 5 levels of brightness which allows you to set the intensity to a level you are comfortable with.

The Dragon Age II BlackWidow's mechanical key technology provides a distinctive tactile feedback in the form of a light pronounced tap to your fingers confirming you have pressed the key. With 50 g optimized actuation force and a reduced actuation distance of 2 mm the Razer Dragon Age II BlackWidow Ultimate lets you play faster than most contemporary keyboards.

Performance

 Macro key binding is made easy in the Razer Dragon Age II BlackWidow Ultimate as with a simple click of 2 buttons you can initiate and end recording lengthy macros. Macros allow you to record complex combination of actions under one button which can be used later during a game to save time. Therefore by pressing one button a series of actions can be initiated in the order it was programmed.

The Razer Dragon Age II BlackWidow Ultimate has a gaming mode which disables the bothersome Windows key that interrupts your game by minimizing the game window when you accidentally press it. When the game mode is active a red G in crosshair will shine on the keyboard. The Dragon Age II Gaming Keyboard runs best on computers that use Window 7, Vista, XP and Mac OS X v10.5 or later. You also have an option of saving up to 10 customizable software profiles with different macro key bindings that you can switch between, even during a game. Profiles are templates that are used to define a keyboard's settings for different characters and games.

The Dragon Age II BlackWidow Ultimate from Razer comes with gaming optimized key matrix to minimize ghosting. You can simultaneously press up to 6 keys and see all the actions being executed, which is of utmost importance in role-playing games and multiplayer games. There are 5 additional keys that are specifically designed to bind macros and these keys are positioned on the left side for quick access.

The Multi-media control keys have been paired with function keys F5 to F8 so that you can change songs or forward a movie directly from your keyboard. The Razer Dragon Age II BlackWidow Ultimate guarantees that your instructions are executed without any delay as it comes with 1000 Hz Ultrapolling and 1 ms response time. The Ultrapolling technology increases the frequency with which the keyboard reports actuation information back to the computer, thereby reducing the data transmission time to 1ms.

Multimedia and Connectivity

 The Razer Dragon Age II BlackWidow Ultimate from Razer makes your life easier as it has an audio out and microphone in jack on the right side of the keyboard. Right next to the audio jacks there is a spare USB port that can be used to connect Portable USB devices or other gaming peripherals. Though the Dragon Age II BlackWidow Ultimate is a plug and play device, you should install the software and drivers from the Razer website to enable advanced features such as macro recording and profile settings. The minimum system requirements to install the Razer Dragon Age II BlackWidow Ultimate are a PC with 2 USB ports, 75 MB of hard disk space and an internet connection for driver and software installation.

productAttributes.productDescription:
Gamers require the very best of products in order to play at their best possible level. These products and equipment also need to withstand the pressure they will be put through during competitions and other events where constant use is inevitable. With the Razer Deathstalker Ultimate Keyboard you will be able to take your gaming to the next level. Interaction and control with Razer’s Ultimate Gaming Keyboard is sure to be a breeze due to the design and sophistication of the gaming accessory. The Switchblade User Interface is a proprietary Razer product that has won the company many accolades. This interface has been used extensively in the Razer Deathstalker Ultimate Keyboard. It features an assortment of ten tactile keys that are adaptive, which means it can change according to the interface chosen. With features like these available in the keyboard you are sure to receive an immersive gaming experience.

The Razer Deathstalker Ultimate Keyboard also comes with the Razer Synapse 2.0, which is a cutting edge proprietary software with innovative functions. It is basically the logic centre for the keyboard, or in other words, it is the keyboard’s processing unit. It automatically synchronizes the keyboard with cloud servers for timely driver updates together with firmware enhancements. The main purpose of the Synapse 2.0 software is to save your individual keyboard settings while the updates take place. Saving these settings on a cloud server will make it easier to update various drivers without the fear of having to reset the whole system and losing precious key bindings. This also ensures that your actions within the game are executed perfectly with no flaws.

The Switchable User Interface is a proprietary interface designed and implemented by Razer. This interface gives the user much more control as compared to other gaming keyboards. The SUI Switchable User Interface makes use of the tactile keys and LCD panel on the keyboard to ensure that key binding is never a hassle for gamers. The SUI allows for an unlimited number of commands which may include macros, skills, spells or any other special attack or defense action you might need. The LCD also serves as a secondary screen which allows for in-game information or widgets to function in full color. The extra information on-screen will certainly help you in gaining that all important edge over the competition.
productAttributes.title: Razer Deathstalker Ultimate USB Keyboard
Apple Wireless Keyboard

productAttributes.productDescription:
When you think back to all the sci-fi shows you have seen, one thing that is commonly seen with future computer systems is the hologram technology and its associated peripherals. Even though we have not reached such heights in technology, the Elecom TK-PBL042BK Wireless Keyboard proves that we are taking all the right steps. This is a wireless keyboard made by the electronics brand Elecom. The specialty of this particular keyboard is not that it is wireless, or that it weighs just around 77 g. The main attraction of this keyboard is that it lacks a physical interface to type on. The Elecom TK-PBL042BK Wireless Keyboard is a revolutionary device that works on the principle of projection technology. The actual keyboard is a sensor within the device. It projects a hologram like image onto any flat surface and the virtual keyboard appears in soft red lighting.

This revolutionary keyboard is perfect for tablets and mobile phones with Bluetooth connectivity. The Elecom TK-PBL042BK Wireless Keyboard’s onboard sensor is perfectly capable of discerning the keystrokes based on the positions of the hand and fingers of the user. The model is also capable of communicating with iOS devices as well as Android phones that have active Bluetooth connections. There is also the possibility of hooking the device up to desktops and notebooks even though it is much more practical for mobile devices and tablets. The device runs on a Lithium-ion battery which is capable of holding a charge for several hours before it needs to be plugged in for a recharge. The HID Human Interface Device charges through a USB cable.

The Elecom TK-PBL042BK Wireless Keyboard is capable of handling around 350 words a minute, which is very good for a projection keyboard where a sensor has to keep up with finger positions in the blink of an eye. The keyboard brightness can be adjusted to save power, which would allow the Elecom TK-PBL042BK Wireless Keyboard to last much longer than with the highest setting. There is also a Mouse Mode which is available on some models of the Elecom Wireless keyboard that allows you to control the mouse pointer with your finger. The keyboard also has feedback in terms of keystroke sounds to let you know that a certain key has been pressed. The Elecom TK-PBL042BK Wireless Keyboard supports 66 keys that are available for use, letting you use more functions with key combos thus enabling you to have the full functionality of a standard keyboard.

productAttributes.productDescription: Chiclet style key caps, Razer Synapse 2.0 enabled, Dedicated Gaming mode, Fixed wrist rest. At Razer, the design element is crucial. Through numerous prototype designs and testing scenarios, we strive to create your perfect keyboard, designed with usability, top-notch performance, and as a magnificent work-of-art that will ultimately benefit you in your quest for total gaming domination. From the design of the keyboard feet, single and tri-color lighting, the angle placement of the keyboard, and various other minor aspects of our keyboards, we ensure that the design signature is simplistic, intuitive, and beneficial for all your gaming needs. As the world leader in gaming peripherals, we at Razer always strive to shatter the normality of current technology. From our revolutionary SwitchBlade User Interface enabled gaming keyboards to our unified cloud solution configurator, we always bring you the latest technology. Our Razer keyboards are dedicated to provide gamers with the best peripherals for an unfair advantage. The MMO specific Razer Anansi gaming keyboard features a seven button thumb modifier key, giving you more macro options to annihilate your foes on the battlefield. From the meticulously calculated travel distance, to the key architecture developed by experts, to finding the precise incline angle, and manufacturing the perfect wrist rest for a more comfortable gaming experience, our mission is to offer you a gaming keyboard with cutting edge ergonomics designed for intuitive game control. Whether you are a MMO, MOBA, FPS, or a MMORPG gamer, our wide range of prolific gaming keyboards are fitted with enhanced features that will enable you to destroy your opponents and leave a trail of destruction in your wake. 10 Key Rollover in gaming mode. Actuate as many keys as you have fingers, and have all of them register accurately and quickly in game. With the Razer DeathStalker Ultimate?s anti-ghosting capabilities, you can deliver overwhelming destruction to your opponents, and ensure that every command is registered and executed perfectly. Razer Synapse 2.0. Razer Synapse 2.0 is cutting-edge, intuitive software that functions as the Razer DeathStalker Ultimate?s brain, automatically syncing the gaming keyboard to a cloud server to download driver and firmware updates, while saving your individual settings. Sync your custom settings and macros automatically with this unified configurator, allowing customization of all your Razer products with a single login. Game Timer: This app allows you to create countdown timers to keep track of events and cooldowns in-game. Know exactly when neutral creeps respawn or time your raids with this easily programmable app. Never miss out on a wave or die unnecessarily in game again.

As part of our SDMS Smart Desktop Management System, this compact keyboard will help organize your gaming desktop to give you as much space as possible. It has 5 individually programmable macro buttons and a mode switch button for switching between the Num Pad function and gaming mode. Among the highlights are three easy-to-reach thumbster keys which can be assigned macros. It also features directional keys, a mode switch button and a Caps Lock key that are all illuminated in atmospheric ice blue.

  • Compact Design Creates Optimum Gamespace
  • Mode Switch Button For Switching Between Num Pad Function And Gaming Mode

  • Anti-Ghosting Capability For Simultaneous Keystrokes
  • Medium-Height Keys With An Optimum Keystroke Response And Perfect Pressure Point
  • High Durability With Robust Metal Base
  • 6 Illuminated Status Keys Directional Keys, Mode Switch Button And Caps Lock Key
